name: JamesA
review: Food and service were excellent! They made my wife's birthday celebration a special one.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: It was poor

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Amazing food

name: Phetamind
review: Really enjoyed my birthday dinner. The food was delicious.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Great food, experience and excellent service.

name: PaulT
review: I really enjoyed this restaurant. The staff was excellent and the food was too. Everything came out in perfect timing. The food was absolutely delicious!

name: LillianI
review: We had excellent time. Food was great and the service was excellent.

name: EvangelineW
review: The food was not the temperature,lobster was tough and so was the Porter house steak

name: john
review: Not gonna make this long,but in a nutshell first time here and this place was aweful.. except for our waitress and a shrimp coctail everything else was terrible.. my ceasar salad was so disgusting,it wasnt even a salad,it was the gross part of the end of the lettuce stalk that u throw away,just brown and gross.. i got the $50 pork chop that was the biggest waste of money.. it was so dark and dim in there so i couldnt even tell what was meat and waht was bone.. i sawed through it because it was so rough,and took a bite and almost broke a tooth because it was a little bit of gristle with a bone on the bottom..only took 3 bites and was all set with it.. it was so gross.. my wife got the scallops,or should i say raw scallops because it was barely cooked.. it cane 7 of then and she ate 2 1/2 of them.. it was barely lit up in there so when we left it was like leaving a cave going straight into sunlight.. our waitress was very very nice though.. she was pleasant and i tipped her very well because obviously the good has nothing to do with her.. and on top of it all it was my birthday dinner.. $226 bill,that i liked a $20 shrimp cocktail out of all of it. Was not happy at all.. $226 bill and i left there starving.. went to johnny rockets and got a $15 burger that was better than everything i had at mjs steakhouse.. terrible food,overly priced.. would not recommend to anyone.. and will not be returning.. and i go to mohegan once a month with my wife to stay the weekend and we go to tao all the time and tuscany all the time and thats where we will continue to go.. terrible birthday dinner..waste of money

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Great food, great service.

name: KatieM
review: Wonderful place for a date night. Many options. Love it there!

review: Excellent steaks and service. Not cheap, but worth the price.

review: It was fabulous

name: TheresaG

name: AlexM
review: Everything was Great and they surprised me with a Glass Of Champagne ü•Ç and a Card ‚ù§Ô∏è

name: DianeP
review: Pleasant personable staff from host to bus boy! Our waitress was perfect. Kudos to all as it was very busy. The food arrived promptly, hot and perfectly prepared. Has never failed to be an enjoyable experience.

name: LisaR
review: The food was good but not outstanding which I would expect at this level.   Service was very good

name: StaceyM
review: Monique was a wonderful, knowledgeable and friendly server! We came for a birthday dinner. She went the extra step helping us find a specialty drink and made the perfect recommendation for our entrees. Monique made my BF's celebration memorable and special! Thank you!

name: Dogwithabone
review: Ordered the special of the day- Tomahawk ribeye for two.  It was a little tough/chewy, not what one would expect at a high end steak house and not for $110.  Wedge salad and creamed spinach were very good.  Bread rolls were average. However, service was excellent!

review: One of the best steak houses I've eaten in. The steak was cooked perfectly and very tender and the sides they offer are great.

name: SecondChild
review: The ambience was nice, fairly quiet considering the chaos and noise of the casino outside, the food was quite nice (particularly the frites, which were tossed in truffle oil, but in addition, tastes as though they were fried in duck fat, as all frites should be) and the service was outstanding. I had the 23 layer chocolate cake for dessert, as it's Michael Jordan's steakhouse and I had to stay on theme. In retrospect, I wish I had ordered the creme brulee, but the accompanying espresso made for a nice end to the meal. Tanya provided outstanding service, put her in for a raise!

name: Armand
review: Very over priced.  While the food was very good, the steak was expensive to start and did not include the high priced side dishes.  Add a couple of drinks each and coffee and one shared dessert - I don't usually spend $240 (plus $48 tip) for two for dinner!!

name: Blklab
review: As always one of our favorite places to eat while we‚Äôre here. We probably come about twice a month to eat. Food is always good menus pretty consistent the staff is always more than accommodating and we always leave with a smile on our face.

name: PamelaK
review: Came out for a birthday dinner and it was great! Steak was really great, service was great, but the noise level was a bit too high due to rowdy people. Overall I would recommend  this place to anyone.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: My husband and I absolutely love going to Michael Jordans!!! We love to celebrate our Wedding anniversary there because the food is great, service is always on point, and we always walk away happy!!! Jen, our server, was also fantastic and made a point to get to know us alittle but even though it was busy!! Highly recommend this restaurant to anyone that stays or visits Mohegan Casino!!!

name: OpenTable Diner
review: MJs is always the goto for steak at Mohegan Sun.

name: TiffanyB
review: Delicious steak , excellent service, pricey but worth it

name: Melo
review: Our waitress Melissa was amazing. The food was the best. Still the best filetmigon I've ever had. Last time I was there was for my 21st birthday and ni had the same plate yesterday. Best way to celebrate my Anniversary with my husband.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Always a good steak here. Mohegan in general is great!

name: OpenTable Diner
review:
Got tenderloin for two,
It was barely enough for one. I know you are going to pay a hefty price for a steak at a ‚Äúhigh end‚Äù steakhouse 
But you expect a portion for two. I will not be going back there soon. There are many far better steakhouses around. Very disappointed

name: Rocky
review: As usual  the food, service, drinks and atmosphere was fantastic. Our waitress Melissa with the braids was fantastic. And for anyone who's never been there I strongly recommend you try it.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Everything was great and the staff were nice

name: OpenTable Diner

name: BobV
review: Amazing flavors worth the money . Food done correctly .

name: AmandaR
review: We celebrated my fianc√©s birthday and it was and all around amazing night and the food was wonderful!

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Always a pleasure

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Birthday. My son‚Äôs 15th birthday. He wanted to experience a steak house & a filet mignon for his birthday. He was more than satisfied. We will be back.

name: TheresaH
review: Our waitstaff was awesome!!! The food was great!

review: We were there to celebrate our Anniversary.  First off they brought us champagne and gingerale because they noticed my husband wasn't drinking...very nice!  The steaks were delicious but one had a little bit more fat.  When the check came it was taken off the bill which we couldn't believe because we didn't ask for anything.  Our server Danielle was excellent and we look forward to dinner here again!  Also order the crab cake...it's pricey but all crab meat no fillers!  Thanks!

name: TyronW
review: Was good shrimp and grits don‚Äôt take it off the menu

name: LauraA
review: Apps were great, so was the service and atmosphere. Steaks were good but not amazing.

name: KellyN
review: Always a great choice while visiting Mohegan Sun. Amazing food, friendly staff and excellent service.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Anniversary

name: AryanaT
review: For my first time here this was an excellent experience! Brandi and Carlos thank you so much for you‚Äôre wonderful service! We enjoyed every minute of being there!

review: Very much a high end restaurant. They do everything very well. The steaks, cocktails and sides are excellent. They are not too high end to get the things you want even if off the menu.

name: ELIZABETHS
review: Michael Jordans steak house is the resturant that is always my 1st choice to have dinnner.  Have been going there for many years.  have never been disappointed with my meal or the service  Staff very friendly and knowlegable

name: TerryS
review:
Very good food
Great service

name: SCOTTM
review: Excellent food, service and atmosphere thought menu was a little expensive

name: MelissaC
review: Food was delicious as usual and the staff were very friendly and informative about the menu

name: sharons
review: The food was delicious, presentation beautiful. Staff was amazing

name: JosephL
review: Enjoyed a dozen fresh juicy oysters and the flight 23 cooked perfectly medium rare.  Love the bernaise sauce.

name: CBirdie
review: Always flawless!!! A relaxing and delicious meal above perfect ;  )  service was amazing.

name: GastonD
review: We love Michael Jordan‚Äôs but last nights server Brian  was preoccupied with other people and did not tend to our needs at all. He never delivered our creamed spinach and wasn‚Äôt around when I wanted another glass of wine.  He never checked after steak was delivered if it was cooked properly. Very disappointed with his service.

name: OpenTable Diner
review:
Food = delicious
Service = outstanding 
Exceeded my expectations

name: JDJD
review: Terrific service, knowledgeable waitstaff and delicious food!

name: MelanieD
review: My boyfriend and I went for dinner with our 5 month old daughter. I was nervous to bring her as I didn‚Äôt want to get weird looks about bringing a baby to a nice restaurant. Every staff member we came across was amazing. Staff that wasn‚Äôt even supposed to help us were stopping to see our daughter and talk to us. Our waitress was so nice and everything came out quickly and was delicious. You get what you pay for here!

name: JohnD
review: We arrived early and were warmly greeted. Our service staff Melissa and Angel were outstanding! We have dined here on several occasions and have never been disappointed. name: KimM

name: OpenTable Diner
review:
Visiting with family

name: EvelynR
review: Overly expensive definitely overrated wont go there again.

name: DanielH

name: BFrank
review: We always enjoy Jordan‚Äôs. It‚Äôs a little splurge but we‚Äôll worth the occasional experience!

name: Gondivin

review: Must have the smoked bacon and garlic bread!  Everything was delicious!  Our server Robert was A++! Friendly, knowledgeable, and made my birthday super special.

review: The grill marks and grilled flavor of the filet mignon OMG so very delicious. The sides are ala Carte but shareable. Everyone was nice and accommodating as could be. I dropped my steak knife and someone replaced it within seconds. I Can't wait to return.

review: First time visit and not sure why it tool us so long to try it. Food and service is wonderful!

name: MarkF
review: The service was the best thing. From start to finish, each employee was awesome! Apps were the bacon & the meatballs. The bacon was incredible, the best part of the meal. The meatballs tasted like they were frozen. Dinner was a filet mignon. It was good. The other was a porterhouse steak, order rare & unsliced. Came out rare & sliced. For that kind of $$, you want it how you ordered it. It was good, not great. Overall, we wouldn‚Äôt go back. Overpriced for decent food & excellent service.

name: Ooreogg
review: MJs never ceases to please us! Love the cheesy garlic bread! Our waitstaff was amazing, always checking on us and great interaction! 23 layer cake?!?!?  So good!!!

name: KA0322
review: Food and service were exceptional, no problems there. But the ambience for a high-end restaurant needs improvement. We specifically started in our reservation that we were celebrating an anniversary, for 2. To be in the same dining room and close to with large parties screaming, clapping, laughing loudly, speaking loudly certainly put a damper on the ambience we were expecting. This definitely put a damper on the evening. For first-time diners, we would have chosen another place if we knew our privacy would be interrupted to this level. We were sitting right next to each other (not across from one another) and we couldn't hear each other speaking. This was disappointing. If I wanted to be exposed to this noise level, we would have sat in the bar.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: the most crucial part of any steakhouse‚Äôs success is the steak‚Ä¶

name: None

name: NickS
review: One of the best steak houses ive been to!!!!

name: PelineC
review: It was unexpected,  the service was  great and the staff was wonderful.  I will definitely come back.

name: MichelleH
review: Service super slow. Entrees not so good but the side dishes and app was good

name: TimothyF
review: Food & Service were great as usual! Expensive but worth it!

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Everything was amazing as usual.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: The food was excellent. The drinks are ridiculously expensive. 20 for a martini.

name: Josie
review:
What a great dinner. The garlic bread with that blue cheese fondue is to
die for. Steak was delish! Katie was an exceptional waitress.  I can not wait to come back again.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Everyone was so nice and accommodating. The food was absolutely delicious.  Will definitely be going back.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Great time

name: TonyJ
review: Great food and service, as always.

name: MichaelD

name: OpenTable Diner
review: My wife and I had a great time. It was a great experience. Food and Service are 5 star.

name: kimc
review: great atmosphere, service is top notch, crab cake is the best you will ever find, and the lamb is delicious!

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Great experience.   Expensive but well worth it for a special occasion.

name: DianaG

name: Chuck
review: Enjoyed our evening.  Food was delicious and the staff's menu recommendations were spot on.

name: OpenTable Diner

name: Madeline
review: We come here often and always love it!! Last night, the service they gave us for my boyfriend's Birthday was outstanding! name: jenniferw
review: Perfect.. seated us when we arrived. Service was good. Meal was amazing as always. Steaks cooked perfectly.

name: JillianL
review: As always best food ever!!!

name: Mubarakah
review: Delicious Food, Beautiful Atmosphere and AMAZING Service.

name: MikoW
review: I have been to MJs restaurant several times and the food this time around was not good. Most of it came out cold or Luke warm. Not sure if there has been a chef change or not, bit it wasn't the best.

name: Joel
review: Great food and service. Would definitely come back again. If you are on a tight budget then dont come here because its a bit pricey.

name: JamesW
review:
Incredible time Robert was amazing 
Thank you for making our special night so memorable

name: jennys
review: Jen is the best waitress around!! She is so personable and attentive.

name: JessieM
review: Very good food and very good service. Had a nice time at a very nice place. SO worth it. Definitely will go back!

name: JoeD
review: We were sat at a table adjacent to the front desk, which made for a very noisy and distracting dining experience. Our sever was very pleasant and prompt and the food, as always, was delicious. If not for the table we were given, it would have been another 5 star meal.

name: NicoleZ
review: Food was absolutely amazing! Love how we got to try so many different steaks. Would definitely come back!

name: JAMESG
review: Great Food as always ‚Ä¶ The service this visit was the best evah!!! Tonya was the best!!!

name: AmyM
review: Best meal I‚Äôve ever had. Jumbo crab app, surf and turf tomahawk with Brussels sprouts side and chimmichuri add on. Literally phenomenal

name: TyroneW
review: My wife and I had a really good time at Micheal Jordan‚Äôs Steakhouse.  The service was amazing and the key lime pie was a hit.  I we loved the garlic bread and crab cake we had for appetizers.  The porterhouse steak for two was delicious.  My wife and I will definitely return to this restaurant for another special occasion.  The price was great as well.  The wait staff was very attentive and our glasses stayed full.  Thank you for such a great evening for our wedding anniversary of 25 years.

name: SSGG
review: It was SO busy for a Monday night! We were told that a group of unexpected patrons showed up and that put a strain on the staff.  Our food was great.  The service was, as you would expect, much slower than normal.  We will definitely return - just hope that the staff/patron ratio is more in balance.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: The service was amazing. Friendly staff very personable and made the experience better. Gave awesome recommendations for food and drinks. Would definitely go back in the future But it‚Äôs a great restaurant for a date

name: GeorgeC
review:
Simone was a great server! Very personable, funny and attentive!  Add great food and a beautiful setting for a wonderful dining experience!  Will definitely be back!

Simone made our birthday celebration  extra special! Thank you!

name: JSeNi
review: Service was outstanding. Unfortunately, our food was not. First time we ate here was great and we decode to come back. For our surprise our stake and octopus had burn pieces. Our stake was supposed to be medium well which means no burn parts. It tasted like dirty grill. Our best choice was the mashed potato trio. I hope others may have a better experience.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: The service was phenomenal. Entire staff was very attentive. However, the food doesn‚Äôt seem to be like what it used to be. One of our steaks was over cooked. Flavor was also lacking. They also changed the butter for their filet mignon. Their bread used to be delicious but that was also changed. Please bring back the old stuff!

name: Alliougana
review: MJ has changed some of their recipes and not in a good way! The corn off the cob dish used to be their best offering. Now it is an unattractive pile of mush that neither looks nor tastes like corn. And the Brussels sprouts used to be crisp and flavorful. Now the are mushy and bland. This was my first time trying the scallops abd was very disappointed in this dish- not tasty and there seemed to be much more mushroom than scallops. My friend did enjoy her baked potato, green salad and steak. Abd we both loved our martinis! Service was outstanding, partly making up for disappointing food.

name: RobertC
review: Brought my girlfriend out for a nice dinner she‚Äôs a big Michael Jordan fan and clearly his career in his playing represents his steakhouse the food was delicious we both got the filet mignon with the meatball appetizer this was her birthday present and at the end of the dinner they surprisingly brought out two glasses of champagne and a small dessert which was also delicious and a very nice surprise I will definitely be going back as I said the food is absolutely delicious the appetizer meatballs or probably some of the best meatballs I‚Äôve ever tasted the staff was Extremely friendly and always making sure that everything was good one of the best dining experiences I‚Äôve ever had

name: RobS
review: Service was great

name: AndrewR
review: The steak was just mediocre and did not justify the price. That was NOT prime steak

name: Jac41179
review: AMAZING As always!

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Great service. Pretty reasonably priced for a steakhouse. Our meals were delicious and our server could not have been any nicer!

name: CrystalM
review: We came here for our anniversary dinner and had a great time! They gave us a card signed by the staff for our anniversary and also a complimentary toast which I thought was very nice.  My fianc√© had the Australian wagyu which was incredible. We are from Boston and typically go to Rare steakhouse inside the Encore casino where he gets domestic wagyu which is over $20 more than the Australian wagyu here and he said it's better! I got the filet which was also incredible and cooked exactly how I wanted it. I also got the loaded baked potato and that was huge and delicious. We definitely will be coming back when we visit Mohegan again

name: ClaudiaC
review: Nice place, great service.  Food and drinks were excellent .

name: RobynO
review: We were here in sept it was delicious and less than we pd now for a meal that was exactly the same and poor quality

name: thomasw
review: Every time I go to mohegan sun it is a must. Never disappoints from food to staff

name: Jason
review: Dallas is so awesome and our server was so nice.  Bday for my wife was happy!

name: JohnS
review: WOW !  the best steak I've ever had.  the trio potatoes were also amazing.  from the host to the bus girl, everyone was professional, courteous, and helpful.  worth every penny

name: RosamyNouel
review: Best place ever to have a nice dinner with family and friends.

name: Turri747
review: From the moment we walked in we felt like VIP's our server Simon and Angel were outstanding! Will be going back!

name: OpenTable Diner
review: The food was very good.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Phenomenal. From the Caesar salad and the tuna tartare to the filet mignon and mashed potatoes. Our server Tanya provided just the right amount of care and knowledge. Just perfect.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: We have been to Michael Jordan‚Äôs many times and this time was very disappointing. The food was very bad. We may not go back again.

name: Nicky
review: Excellent food and service!

name: SergioG
review: My first time there. I was impressed. The food was great. The service was swift. I would definitely recommend.

name: DanM
review: The dinner was truly outstanding. Everything from the drinks to the appetizers and steak entrees were exceptional, as was the service. Among the best restaurants I‚Äôve ever eaten at.

name: bassclef04
review: Steak was made to perfection!! Top notch service!

name: KimberlyC
review: Celebrated my birthday in grand-MJ style.  It was absolutely perfect in every way. Exceptional service and food, plus a bubbly toast and birthday dessert.  Can‚Äôt wait to return.

name: AvaG
review: Crab cake wasn‚Äôt as good as before and it‚Äôs more costly . The service was good the only issue was with the host. I arrived prior to my friend who was trying to find parking in the garage and he wouldn‚Äôt seat me. A few mins later the female hostess came over and sat me prior to my friend entering the restaurant. I wish they offered the Japanese wagyu.

name: MarioG
review:
The restaurant should close
The worst meal I ever had! Hard bread, like a rock, gnocchi pasta was dry and burnt, steak was Served with butter on top and the butter didn‚Äôt melt because the steak was cold, burnt on the outside and basically raw!!
Mashed potatoes weren‚Äôt bad but also cold. Creamed spinach not bad

name: ACB516
review: MJ‚Äôs was amazing this time around for my husband‚Äôs birthday! Sometimes it‚Äôs been hit or miss but this time was stellar - our waitress, Amanda, was EXCELLENT - she was busy but always came back at the right time if we needed something. Food was fabulous and cooked to perfection. Great experience!

name: JeffE
review: Just what we needed.  Date night ( first in YEARS with 3 year old at home.)   Pigged out with a Flight of Meat, plus cold seafood and a 2000 later cake.   Server was FANTASTIC..

name: StephenO
review: this place is amazing, great times and even better food every single time

name: kellyh
review: The food was phenomenal - our server was Jen and she was beyond outstanding in terms of her demeanor, pleasant, funny, offering suggestions, being attentive to the birthday girl. The other servers who helped clear, poured water were all also pros at what they do - they moved so quickly I did not catch their names but let's just say everyone working there that night was fabulous. The low lighting would make this a nice date or anniversary dinner spot - but the laid back atmosphere could be enjoyed for any occassion.

name: FranR
review: Belated Valentine‚Äôs dinner

name: MICHELLED
review: Best experience ever! Food was great! customer service excellent! Highly recommend!

name: HeleneL
review: Usually when we dine here my steak is very good--however the Delmonico was quite tough and a bit less flavorful than I have experienced in the past. Not thrilled, given the costs of the meals. I don't mind spending if the meal is worth it, but this wasn't.

name: janetg
review: Valentines

name: Johnbarb
review: Everything was great.   Service was outstanding food was great.    I highly recommend this restaurant to everyone!

name: NinaP
review: This was an outstanding dining experience, our server Brandy was very knowledgeable, Personable, attentative and friendly. The food quality and flavor was exquisite. Bathrooms had impeccable cleanliness. The entire experience was fabulous. Thank you so much for an amazing dinner out.

name: jojo
review:
The porter house steak  for two  is way two small and not a tender piece of meat.
Our waitress was the best. I believe her name was Brandy. The sides were very good.
and they were different. Our waitress brought us two glasses of Champaign and a brownie with ice cream since we were celebrating our Anniversary.

name: JohnG
review: The steaks are always cooked to perfection and the service is always great.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Food and service was excellent! Drinks were great. Will go back again.

name: Hav2eat
review: Chris S. was a very good server! Our steaks were cooked exactly the way we ordered them, although my wagyu was a little disappointing. I‚Äôm not sure if it‚Äôs tough to get a good quality steak because of COVID-19 times. The last time I had gone there and ordered it it was phenomenal and tender. As it should be for a 12 ounce $85 steak. The garlic bread and bacon appetizers were spot on and delicious as always. And ending our meal with the baked Alaska never disappoints. We really appreciated that Chris brought us out a cup of coffee and champagne on the house to celebrate our special night!

name: NYFoodie
review:
$43 Scallop plate is a half plate of food, No longer can you add a small lobster tail for $16 to steak to create your own Surf and Turf. Filet Mignon 7 oz was $32, now $48. For my wine taste notable reislings are not on the wine list any longer, my favorite reisling is gone. We ordered a substitute wine that didn‚Äôt measure up.  Not the value for your money that you once received at MJs. However service is still ok, staff has a great attitude!
**LATE NOTE- MJs must have seen this review, and CANCELED OUR Open table 100 pt reservation reward, 
EVENTHOUGH WE BOTH ORDERED ENTREES, me the $43 half-plate scallops, and my wife the Short Rib pasta..So WHY THE CANCELED POINTS?

name: Steve
review: Outstanding food, great service, best place at Mohegan to eat, little on the more expensive side

name: Bill
review: Outstanding all the way around!!! Always a pleasure being there

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Pre valentines dinner. It was outstanding, as usual.

name: Matthew
review: Was an above average meal. Service was attentive and friendly. Steak and salad was very good, but the Arethusa garlic bread appetizer was amazing!

name: ElizabethS
review: Birthday dinner it was so great!

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Excellent dinner and service

name: Shummy
review: Food was great and our server Brandy was terrific.  A great night out!

name: THEBUTLER
review: The servers were attentive and  well informed.  The Kansas city steak and  lamb chops were delicious.  Don t miss the Baked  Alaska and a special martini. We will return

name: DanielH
review: The food is delicious and very well worth the price !

name: TracyG
review: Perfect! Food was cooked to perfection, server has great recommendations , champagne toast for a birthday. Nice and quiet.

name: CHRISTOPHERB
review: Great meal, great staff

name: CarolynH
review:
Amazing food, service, and ambiance  
Very Positive Energy from staff. It was a welcome surprise to see people who really LOVE their job. They were more than helpful and very knowledgeable.  It was pricey but worth every penny. Well done to Michael Jordans from chefs to wait staff. Great job!

name: jenniferw
review: Had reservations for a table.. changed to sit at the bar. Service was excellent.. Brad was very friendly and made the best espresso martini.

name: WilliamM
review: delicious food beautifully presented attentive staff great experience from start to finish. Highly recommend

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Crab cake was not skimpy on the crab which is a plus, but the sauce got overwhelming salty after the second bite maybe a little sweeter sauce since the crab is already salty. Wagyu meatball tastes like a regular meatballs, but we made a little meatball sub with the rolls they gave us, that was good. I also felt the Delmonico was alright slightly salty too. Alaskan wagyu was delicious. Creamy spinach is also a plus. And the corn off the cob was very delicious so much of its own flavors, perfect side to replenish your tastebuds. Our waitress was awesome too! Overall not a bad place !

name: EdwardJ
review: I would absolutely dine at the restaurant again.The somlier Ryan was awesome. ,he directed us to a perfectly paired bottle.The meal choice of Ribeye Tomahawk in Madeira Wine smothered in mushrooms was over the top.The garlic bread and wedge salad were also great .

name: Cathy
review: Our server was attentive, sensitive to my food allergies and fast. The food was fabulous!!!

name: PeggyP
review: Amazing restaurant at Mohegan Sun in CT,! It was the best birthday experience, staff was beyond courteous and the filet mignonette melted in my mouth!!  ü§©üéâüéÇüôå

name: JeffreyC
review: It wasn't the best I have ever gone to. It was a good meal. To be fair, I wasn't very hungry and ordered a small filet. A filet is far from the tastiest piece of meat to order, but it was good. Cooked how I asked. The sides were very good. Again, really nothing to complain about, just wasn't wowed!

name: kristine
review: Nick was a wonderful server. Very knowledgeable and professional.  He helped make our experience outstanding

name: Amanda
review: This was my first time to MJs, I was so impressed! Amanda was fantastic, very personable and attentive. My boyfriend and I are both in the restaurant business so it's always nice when we can get away and enjoy great service and food. A great treat and I can't wait until next time.

name: ChelseaR
review: Food was amazing! Robert our server was fantastic! Highly recommend the crab cake

name: OpenTable Diner
review:
It was my fianc√©‚Äôs birthday, I ordered the Delmonico steak. Despite the fact that it was cooked to the right temperature It was extremely charred all over and burnt on one edge. My fianc√© ordered the Salmon, and the portion was ridiculously small for the price, approximately 2‚Äù X 5‚Äù and the eggplant that accompanied it was under cooked and slimy in texture. The quality and portion size was no where near worth the cost! I paid $240 for a dinner that I could have gotten at Texas Roadhouse that would have been not only cheaper but better!
I‚Äôve had much better cuts of meat and fish that were prepared correctly and proper portions at Ruth Chris steakhouse for a comparable price to yours.
The service was great for sure.
I refused to make a big issue of it at the time considering the occasion. I didn‚Äôt want to make it worse. 
Definitely not worth the money!
We won‚Äôt be back to say the least.

name: DennisG
review: Our evening at Michael Jordan‚Äôs Steakhouse at Mohegan was phenomenal. They chose a booth for the three of us. It was quieter than the tables in the main dining area. Our dinner was exceptional. The service even better. It was such a treat to have service that was at the stellar level. They made our evening totally enjoyable. Can‚Äôt wait to return.

name: Chelsea
review:
My server was excellent....
I highly recommend this restaurant.
Food was great also

name: DanielS
review: Eat at the bar for personal bartender attention. Brad and Shirley are the best!

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Nice relaxing dinner with friends.

name: sara
review: Very nice ambience, wait staff excellent. Food great. What a pleasure

name: MargaretM
review:
Overall I would eat here again!
The food was delicious and the service was very good.

name: Seymour
review: The service was great but the Wagyu was tough and chewy even when asked for a medium cook. Overall the drinks were strong but a bit lacking on flavor. Fantastic Frozen Alaska dessert but a bit pricey for the quality of the meat served.

name: JamesW
review: Wonderful!

name: Cath
review: We had fantastic service!  It was a great date night out!

name: PattieC
review: Been there a lot and always great

name: AnthonyC
review: This was probably the 20th time I have been to mj‚Äôs and as always it was spot on. The garlic bread with blue cheese is a must for an app. Steaks and sides were cooked to perfection as always and a our waiter Chris K was great. Chris was spot on with recommendations and was very personable.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: 50th Birthday for my fianc√©. Y‚Äôall are always extremely accommodating and service and staff are absolutely awesome. Thank you for making her Birthday just a little more special!

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Steak cooked perfect  ambiance was nice except we were not finished and apparently around 9pm the lights went from dim to bright .. like they were getting ready to close  they didn‚Äôt rush us but to late the mood already changed

name: Eddie
review: We are regulars at MJ, we have been coming to eat here for years. We were excited to be back and eat one of our favorite dishes the wagyu steak. The price went up but we still ordered it and was disappointed. We both noticed right way and questioned the quality of the steak and the method it was cooked. We asked the steak to be cooked medium and it was almost cooked med well to well done. I could not finish almost have of the steak because it was like cutting into a piece of charcoal. Very disappointed.

name: TimA
review: Awesome experience. Steaks were cooked perfectly, the tuna cevece was fresh...can't say enough good about it.

name: AmandaB
review: Service was exceptional. Staff was kind and attentive. Can‚Äôt wait to go back.

name: REBECCAS
review: The service was very good but the food was very disappointing. We each ordered the filet mignon and they were well done instead of the medium rare.  Our friends ordered the porter house for 2 and that was also overcooked. The sides we ordered were good.

name: Kimberlyw
review: Delmonico was cooked perfectly! Everything was great especially our server!!!

name: RichardT
review: Great food!, The crabcakes are amazing.  Would definitely recommend it to anyone.

name: SusanO
review:
Great experience from start to finish
 Celebrating my birthday 
Not only did I get a signed birthday card but we enjoyed a Prosecco toast
Simone and her assistant were attentive 
Food was wonderful 
Thanks to all for a great birthday

name: joseph
review: one of the host was kinded rude so want to the other one an she was wonderful.

name: JoyM
review: Birthday  celebration

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Food was delicious, service was excellent. In my 15+ visits here the steak is always cooked PERFECT. The breadstick appetizer is a must try. Corn for a side is always a win. Atmosphere was a little loud, but it was just people having fun on a Saturday night and I‚Äôm basically an old curmudgeon

name: JenniferB
review: Absolutely delicious!!! Great date night or night out with friends !!

name: MargaritaV
review: Celebrating my husbands birthday. Great time, great food!

name: KARENKES
review: Great food and service

name: EllaP
review: Absolutely DELICIOUS! Service is always superb and Dallas makes you feel like family...they all do! This is a great place to "get away" from all going on in the world, have a great meal and relax a bit. Love many of the new menu items as well as my favorite steak, unique menu!

name: OpenTable Diner
review: I was definitely disappointed with my recent dining experience at Michael Jordan's Steakhouse. My guest and I each ordered a steak with him having the 10oz filet and I having the Kansas City. His filet was burnt and my steak was very tough and salty. The side of corn which is normally delicious was less than satisfactory as it appeared to be overdone. We did dine later in the evening and it seemed like there was a significant lack of attention to detail perhaps due to the time of our visit. We are both pretty good players at Mohegan Sun and were looking forward to a great meal but sadly that isn't how it went. We did complain to the manager on duty (Mike) but was told we should have complained before finishing our meal. He did take off a couple of the appetizers and gave us a dessert on the house but honestly just feel it wasn't good enough. I seriously doubt I will revisit anytime soon as I feel the food quality has declined significantly. Thank you for your time and I hope you find this feedback helpful.

name: ShannonM
review: We were celebrating a birthday and the staff really made us feel special with touches like champagne and a signed bday card.

name: RobertW
review: The entire staff was very polite and helpful, willing to answer any questions we had.

name: karenb
review: The service was amazing!! Our waitress made the meal.

name: Anna
review: Michael Jordan‚Äôs never disappoints!! The renovations are beautiful and we got 4 seats at the big new bar. The service was exceptional as always and the dinner was equally as good. I had the steak frites (first time!) and it was delicious!  The steak was perfectly cooked and the French fries were crisp and hot. My husband had the short rib pasta - one of his favorite dishes. Our friends split the strip steak and loved ever bite!

name: danu
review:
Noise level I mean as low, very nice.
I am an old timer been going to MJ‚Äôs since opening in Mohegan Sun.
My go to Best Restaurant there.
Staff always professional and friendly.
Food items always great if there was ever something wrong would not be a problem. I am sure they would make it rite.
Restaurants in a Casino tend to be extra Friendly.

name: JeanneS
review: Having been a patron of Mohegan sun Michael Jordan‚Äôs steakhouse for many years we were a bit disappointed with the restaurant during this stay. I always accepted the restaurant was typically a little pricey. We found this time the prices to be extremely high. Where I use to pay 50.00 range for a steak was now 70.00 dollars. Items that I always looked forward to having are no longer on menu. Items like the wedge salad with blue cheese and lobster mashed potatoe are no longer offered. I can say one area that was not changed was the quality of food and exceptional service staff. Honestly I think we will be trying other restaurants during future stays at Mohegan sun.

name: SandraP
review: Always great food and service.  We had late night reservations so noise level was minimal, but it can get noisy when full during peak hours.  Even though we were the last couple dining before they closed, we were not rushed and the staff was very gracious and accommodating.  We have dined there many times and have never been disappointed.  We will be back soon!

name: Burma
review: Food, Service and Quality make this steakhouse one of the best.

name: AnneB
review: The food and service was excellent

name: JustineD
review: I LOVE THIS PLACE!!!!!!

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Excellent food and service as always!

name: AndrewB
review: The service, food and ambiance were all fantastic and I would definitely come back!

name: JohnA
review: Great atmosphere . Wait staff was personable and professional. Food was outstanding. I recommend the garlic bread for one of the appetizers.  Price overall was good.

name: jasonl
review: Omg it‚Äôs the best Chris Klein is the best .my kids love the macaroni and cheese it‚Äôs great

name: OpenTable Diner
review: The food was amazing and service exceptional.   We went for our anniversary with another couple. We were treated very well. The booth seating cut down the noise from the rest of the restaurant-Made the experience more intimate and relaxing.  We were never rushed.  The drink and wine selection was phenomenal.  Prices are as expected for the venue, but I would add that aside from the steak everything else is a bit over priced.  That is the only slightly negative statement I will make. The waitress was funny and attentive but not crowding us.  The sommelier was very helpful.  Food was cooked well and tasty.  I was very surprised at the number of kids at the restaurant.  They were all well behaved and did not detract from the experience.   Will definitely go back soon!

name: StoryK
review:
Everything was amazing! We had the wagyu meatballs and garlic bread for starters. Our server was very accommodating and allowed us to do the half order of garlic bread so we didn‚Äôt fill up. Our food runner was awesome in the sense that he explained all the ingredients/ garnishing and even gave personal recommendations. I had the 7oz. Filet mignon and it was delicious and so tender! The creamed spinach may be one the best I‚Äôve had as well. My boyfriend had the Australian wagyu, and it was a large portion & flavor was great.
We would definitely come back here (and we actually may one more time before we leave)

name: RDRev
review: Our server was great and the porterhouse for two was excellent as usual.

name: OpenTable Diner
review:
Been going to MJ‚Äôs the past ten years for our anniversary. Wouldn‚Äôt think to go anywhere else to celebrate!!!
Best Steak house in my opinion!!!

name: Norwichgirl
review: We ordered the Tomahawk steak based on the recommendation from our server and she was spot on. Melissa, our server, was fantastic. She made us feel very welcome and not rushed which seems to happen in many restaurants these days. We had no electric or heat at home and were in no hurry to leave. She understood our dilemma and was very kind and patient.  She was so accommodating and even rectified our vegetable order which was way too spicey. Overall wonderful experience with great table and bar service. One of the best martini's I ever had!

name: Kjcmr
review: We had a great  dinner. Everyone and everything was perfect

name: PaulB
review: My steak was great. The Tito‚Äôs Honey crisp cocktail was delicious. I loved the bacon Gouda mashed potatoes

name: Shannon
review: The ambiance was nice but my steak was very over cooked and my friends shake was very undercooked. Overall not worth the money.

name: CindyC
review:
Food was delicious! Every streak, the potato trio and asparagus too!
Octopus was delicious too.  Expensive but worth it for a special occasion

name: Tony
review: Waitress was fantastic and food top notch.  Would recommend to all.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Not my best experience here, have been a few times and this time just ok‚Ä¶ the back of the house is a much better experience

name: MissCityFood
review: Tammy, our server was excellent. Rolls were warm when brought to the table; I wished the prime Delmonico steak was brought to the table hot. It was prepared medium to medium rare (as ordered) but flavorless - perhaps because it was sliced in the kitchen and not rested enough. The kitchen split the Caesar salad between two people and it was small but still tasty. The side of mushrooms came out along with the steak and was hot due to being served in a cast iron dish. As an accompaniment to the lukewarm steak it was perfect. Service was excellent despite it being very business so we will return and try the ribeye or tomahawk (unsliced).

name: CraigL
review: Went for our anniversary pretty loud and had doors open next to us while eating alot dust from people walking outside also took a while for out meal and was cold when we received our meal and drinks way overpriced ballo has alot less priced drinks

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Was amazing, besides the new year we were celebrating my wife‚Äôs birthday, they gave us the best treatment ever, they served us in excellence, my wife received a birthday card and a wonderful treatment. The food was delicious, in every prep and detail, they treat us like kings and queens!!

name: Rocky
review: Another enjoyable two evenings (30th and 31st) at our favorite restaurant. The food, service and atmosphere was great both nights. Adrian on the 30th and Robert on the 31st. tried some different things and was completely happy with everything, especially the Grilled corn off the cob and the truffle parmesan was a great add on to a perfectly cooked Filet Mignon. The Halibut was one of the best my Girlfriend ever had. Once again two more great nights and dinners. Dallas and his staff are the best there are and we will continue to keep going back.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: We were seated immediately and service was excellent.

name: SandraB
review: Nichole was our waitress,  and we were very impressed with her attentiveness and concern for what we needed.  she went above and beyond.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: We love this steakhouse, one of our most favorite restaurants. Service was great, managment is great, food is outstanding always.

name: RobinD
review: There were 4 in our party and we all got the large filet mignon, medium. Three were juicy and perfect. One was over cooked and dry. Everything else was perfect.

name: LindsayP
review: Our server Amanda was awesome !! She was so friendly and really made our dinner so special. It was our first time here and we will definitely be back on our next Mohegan trip !

name: DavidH
review: Overall a decent experience.  Probably not worth the money but the best option at Mohegan Sun

name: Holl
review: Very unimpressed with Michael Jordan's after their re-opening. This was one of our favorite restaurants at Mohegan, but not sure if we'll be returning. Food was not the quality we were used to and the service from the staff was extremely lacking.

name: TimothyF
review: Another outstanding meal! Steaks are amazing! Service was great! Best restaurant in Mohegan/Foxwoods area!

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Great food and service

name: brittanyH
review: Sirloin was way too rare but still delicious. Rest of food amazing

name: RichP
review: My wife and I made a reservation for 8pm. The service was excellent, but some of the food items were very questionable. We ordered the 7oz. Filet mignon and I ordered a 10 oz. flank steak, both were very delicious. We had broiled scallops and shrimp, both were delicious. For sides, we ordered a mashed potato sampler which was medicore at best. Our vegatable was roasted asparagus which was absolutely horrible, we had the waiter take it back which he removed from our bill. Overall, it was okay for first-timers. I personally think that for the price you're paying, it could be far better for all the hype I heard about MJ's steakhouse. Previously, we went to the MJ sportsbar which quite ironically, was much better experience at more reasonable prices.

name: JudyC
review: Very busy. Had to wait a little past our reservation time. At least 1/2 hour. After that service and food was great

name: PaulA
review: The steaks, salads, sides and dessert were even better than I expected - and I'd been here before. However, the one thing that stood out above everything else was the service. Perfect in every way especially our server who was friendly, answered every question and served our meal the perfect temperature and without delay. An incredibly good experience at this restaurant.

name: Bella
review: Amazing service and food. We enjoyed so much! The staff was super kind, we had a great experience.

name: MichaelK
review: It was fine no comparison to ‚ÄúRare‚Äù in the Encor

name: Vozzy
review: Love the new renovation and layout.  Our server, Allison was knowledgeable and attentive and very friendly, food was excellent as always.  A very enjoyable evening.  Will definitely be back when in the area again.

name: TimF
review: The MJ steakhouse at Mohegan was awesome!  We had a great experience for Christmas dinner!

name: Foodie
review: The lobster meal was tough and underwhelming. Also was very disappointed Michael Jordan's doesn't enforce the "no hat" policy!  In my opinion, you charge the prices Jordan's charges, I would expect the Mgt to enforce traditional etiquette!

name: JoanB
review: Michael Jordans was a great place for Christmas dinner. Our waiter was fantastic. The food was hot and delicious.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Enjoyed a Christmas dinner with wife and friends. If you are not aware of the prices you need to review them before you go. 1 steak (no sides) will run $45 to $120. A dinner for four will easily cost $500 and up. But the food is delicious!

name: stevent
review: Outstanding service and food quality. Drinks were the best

name: Lambchopporky
review: Michael Jordans is a great place. Food is excellent. The lemon drop martini made with fresh lemon is excellent. I wish they would put the wedge salad back on the menu.  Service was perfect. Didn‚Äôt rush us at all. The 23 layer cake is absolutely delicious. Perfect to split with others.

name: Really
review: Service was good, blows my mind that no one asked me why I left most of my steak on my plate. Side note to cook, you should have taken my fillet of the grill about an hour sooner. I didn‚Äôt want to complain, being Christmas Eve. I had surgery 4 days prior, and didn‚Äôt have the energy to deal with it. Last but not least. I‚Äôve been eating there from day one, and generally food is good. I guess every restaurant is allowed to provide a bad meal now and then.

name: Damir
review: Very nice steakhouse... great atmosphere! Very pleasant and knowledgeable staff.

name: MelO
review: It was ok. Nothing special for the price. My steak wasn‚Äôt cooked to my liking but we waited  for a while for the food to come out so it wasn‚Äôt worth the extra wait.

name: Mitchb
review:
Third time dining here. Service was impeccable, food was amazing. It is my go to when visiting Mohegan. Could not fit in dessert, from appetizers to mains everything was phenomenal.

Little bit on the pricey side, but you get what you pay for. If you want a great steak, this is your place.

name: EricaM
review: Shirley, Kyle, Tom, Sebastian, Tim, Nick, Tyler, Dallas and the rest made it absolutely wonderful üòä

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Remodel was nice. Waited the longest we ever had for server to come over and take drink order- even longer to get drinks. Some menu  items were different and not as good - maybe new purveyors? Most likely COVID related issues caused changes.

name: brucej
review: birthday night for our son.     Dallas, the manager, came to table to congratulate.    extremely professional.     mj's issued a birthday desert/with candle.     our waiter performed perfectly and professionally.     food was great.     been there numerous times.    surely seems to continually be a well run establishment.

name: ShirleyM
review: We enjoyed the wonderful food and comfortable setting.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Great service and food

name: Amy5
review: Birthday.  Good had wonderful taste, drink list could be better.  Loved the experience but a little pricey but. I will go back

name: DianaP
review: We love dining at Michael Jordan‚Äôs Steakhouse. Great atmosphere and the food is excellent. Our waitress Allison was friendly and very attentive. We will be back!

name: tinar
review: Garlic bread was burnt on the bottom.  Then On some pieces the bottom was cut off completely to hide the fact the bottom was burnt. Crab cakes were not worth $40.

name: TaraV
review: Steak is still good, but I miss the delicious rolls and the lobster mashed.

name: UncleRandy
review: Our Server Danielle was fantastic last night. Took care of everything we needed.

name: izmirf
review: everything was great food was excellent will be back for sure

name: OpenTable Diner
review:
Good food , mid week but very busy and rather
  Loud

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Great!!! Great food fast service both of us were very pleased

name: Russ
review: excellent and courteous staff food was cooked to our groups satisfaction

name: Jason
review: Sara was awesome!

name: JamesB
review: When we want steak we go to Michael Jordan's. Christmas gift for the both of us was to eat there. Will be back again!

name: ToddS
review: Service was great! Kamee was amazing!  Steaks were best we've had here! Bone 45 day aged sirloins were the SO flavorful.  And others had the 7 oz filet which was tender and perfect sized after salads, bred (with awesome butter), loaded baked potato (big enough for 4 of us to split), corn off the cob etc.!  Great atmosphere, great wine, all in all one o the best experiences we've had t MJ's!!!!

name: CraigL
review: Went for our anniversary i requested quiet table they put us next to a large loud Christmas party food was ok little pricey for what you get might not recommend and im n a wheelchair asked to keep it close by manager put it way n back no were to be found incase of emergency thats not cool

name: Jason
review: Ryan always make you feel welcome and it was great to meet Dallas.  See you tomorrow night!

name: gustavol
review: We had a reservation for 5:00 p.m. Halfway through our dinner a group (maybe 30 plus began to take up space in front of our table.  Perhaps a holiday celebration.  The manager had to be called. Worst experience ever during a private celebration.

name: EllenB
review: Was a little disappointed on the shrimp cocktail.  The sauce was boring, needed some horseradish and they could have been colder.  Other than that, we enjoyed our meal!

name: OpenTable Diner
review: My husband and I have eaten here 3x now and we LOVE this steakhouse. The food was magnificent! Tried raw oysters for the first time and they were outstanding as well as the steak and lamb chops we ordered. Our server I think his name was Robert was great. I have enjoyed this place all 3 occasions. Our favorite date night spot from the drinks to dessert did not disappoint.

name: Donald
review: The service and food were both fantastic!  The Mac & Cheese is a must have!

name: CathyL
review: I felt the food, from garlic bread to my lobster dish was way too buttery.  I like my food to be on the plain side.

name: MaryP
review: It seems that MJs is going down hill.  I guess they no longer wash the lettuce since I found girt and dirt in mine.  Mushrooms were undercooked.  How do you undercook. Mushrooms?  The filet was over cooked and not medium.  Service was on the slow side despite the fact that we had an early reservation and not that many customers were there yet.  Since all of my party had the salad, we all got sick.  We all had a different main course, so it was probably the salad.

name: Britt
review: I liked the food choices however I felt our steaks could‚Äôve been more seasoned and my parmesan truffle fries didn‚Äôt have any salt on them. Overall the restaurant was a great time. I went for my husband‚Äôs birthday, the staff did a great job helping us celebrate, and we plan to come back again.

name: MeghanM
review: Pricy but definitely worth it - the food was amazing

name: PatrickT
review:
Service was outstanding.  It was our Anniversary and we were treated very special. We requested a booth and although it was a busy Saturday night, were accomadated.  
Both Halibut and Filet were cooked and prepared perfectly.

name: Nicole
review: Excellent!!! From start to finish....would recommend to anyone. Prices are high but the quality was exceptional.

name: Jo1315
review: Every single thing was delicious! For appetizers don't skip the Garlic Bread and Shishito Peppers, you will be sorry if you do! I tried the Seafood Stuffed Lobster and it was FILLED with meat, such a great dish! Lastly, DO NOT skip the Grilled Corn Off The Cob, it's incredibly flavorful, just DELICIOUS!!!!!

name: PaulB
review: Our steaks and sides were amazing. Service was amazing but not a quiet dinner‚Ä¶ too loud for my mother.

name: ShariR
review: Been going here for so many years.....always my favorite....always consistent.   This time however I left not so happy.  the Caesar salad is my favorite....value for the $....well the new chef changed it......raised the price $5 and puts 4 baby romaine hearts on a plate......also changed the recipe for the dressing.  not worth it.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Wedding anniversary

name: BettiDC
review: It was an  enjoyable dinner with my friend who was celebrating her birthday. The food was excellent, although my friend was hoping the wedge salad was on the menu as we had it in the past, the chopped salad was good.

name: luv2eat
review: Once again Michael Jordan‚Äôs DID NOT disappoint. We always look forward to dining here when we are In Connecticut. We always have there Crab cake. First the STAFF is amazing‚Ä¶extremely professional and always warm and welcoming. They have employees working there over 15 years. The menu has been updated. Start with the Tuna tartare/crab cake/octopus. Share a steak and make sure you get the oyster mushrooms and Brussel sprouts. Plenty of other sides but I was hooked on those two sides. My husband had the Halibut two days in a row. Let‚Äôs not forget the bartenders‚Ä¶They made us ‚Äúmy special cocktail‚Äù exactly the way I enjoy it! Thank you and looking forward to returning.

name: DaleS
review: My wife and I had dinner here after attending a concert. It was our second time and did not disappoint. We had custom cocktails, the Porterhouse for Two, and shared a baked potato. We will be returning I am sure.

name: TomC
review: Outstanding all around. Fantastic steak & sides, top-notch service, great atmosphere.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Anniversary

name: Susie
review: We were looking forward to eating here and were disappointed.   Let's talk food first - The meatballs were quite good.  We also had the crab cake.  It was chock full of crab (which was fantastic) but it was bland.  Both the cake and the sauce needed far more seasoning.  The sauce almost seemed like it was just mayonnaise too.  Certainly nothing special and it could have been.  And we should have asked the price (it said MP on the menu) because when the bill came, the crab cake was $40 which to us, was way overpriced.  My husband's meal was ok but certainly nothing to write home about when it came to the filet.  And that was disappointing because this is a steakhouse.  My salmon was very good but it came with arugula and pomegranates which I like but they were plopped into the sauce.  Arugula and sauce is not an appetizing combo.  It also came with eggplant which was good but once again, under seasoned. Not much the server can do as this speaks to food preparation and menu combos.  We also got the mashed potatoes and they were not that warm by the time they got to our table along with the meal (but they were delicious).  Regarding the service - our server was very friendly and very attentive.  Only suggestion is to make sure the extra glassware is taken from the table (i.e. when bringing a second glass of wine, take the glass holder of the first wine off the table.  If a guest isn't having wine, remove their wine glass).  That's small so not too big of a deal but since this is a higher end place, just passing along.  The ambience - it is fine/good.  I did like how the tables at least where we were seated are not too close to each other like some restaurants are.

name: TracyB
review: Never disappointed when we eat here the food and service are amazing

name: SalvatoreR
review: Never disappointed when dining here. We can't say enough about the food, service, etc...everything is amazing and we absolutely love it!

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Food was great! Steak at the point! Best Medium steak Ive ever eat!

name: ErinH
review: Always an excellent meal!

name: Kathy
review: Don‚Äôt waste my time and money with the East beach oysters.  If you open an oyster and there‚Äôs barely an oyster In there, don‚Äôt serve it  to your patrons.  The sea scallops were excellent along with the creamed spinach.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Went to MJs celebrating my fiancees battle with some health issues. Amanda our liaison, and I say that because she was by far better than a waitress and not a server, was absolutely charming, warm, friendly, and catered to us unbelievably. Please be sure she gets this feedback. She was awesome. The ribeye steak was incredibly good, cooked perfectly. Sides were perfect(asparagus, mashed potatoes) and the Garlic Bread with Arethusa Farms blue cheese fondue is absolutely something you can not pass by! Michael Jordan‚Äôs restaurant is by far the best dining destination at the Mohegan Sun Casino if not in the state if you are a carnivore!

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Our waiter Brian was outstanding he was attentive but did hover he was extremely knowledgeable on the food and especially the wine. We were celebrating our anniversary and they had a very nice booth for us with high padded sides that helped to keep the noise down, the Anniversary card signed by the staff and complimentary champagne toast was a special touch.

name: Customer
review: Wonderful experience. Can‚Äôt wait to return.  Service fabulous; attentive, super kind & friendly.  Food delish, filet mignon so good, Brussels sprouts awesome-one order enough for 3 ppl.  Garlic bread, dipped in blue cheese was so yummy.

name: ChrisL
review:
I have been going here for years 
The menu had changed for the worse 
No more pork chop 
the food and presentation is not what it always was
Sorry I cannot recommend until it is improved to the way it was in the past

name: JohnQ
review: Christmas dinner with family.l was fantastic, felt at home with friendly service great food overall fabulous experience. Love the new look.

name: LoriP
review: You will pay money for this dinner, but it is always delicious and worth it.

name: MarianneW
review: Although I called this restaurant twice to ask whether they were serving a Thanksgiving meal and no one ever called me back, were were in luck. The turkey dinner was delicious.

name: JohnL
review:
Must get the Cowboy Rib Eye. 
Crab cake is excellent. 
Wish they had turkey dinner on the menu all the time. 

We came by on Thanksgiving to celebrate our daughter's birthday and Thanksgiving of course. We notified MJ's ahead of time and we were greeted with a birthday card signed by the staff. My daughter was slightly embarrassed but we were extremely impressed. 

Our server was great. Service was speedy. We were in and out in less than hour and we're ecstatic about that. 

At the end of the meal, a brownie sundae with a lit candle was brought to our table to help celebrate my daughter's birthday. 

MJ's was awesome. I'll be sure to come back again. Thank you.

name: mike
review: Excellent food and service as usual. Great steak!,

name: TomR
review: I got the 45 dry aged prime Delmonic.  Steak was dry, seemed to be maybe previously frozen or something.  Asked for medium rare, but was more like medium.  It wasn‚Äôt juicy and it wasn‚Äôt ‚Äúmelt in your mouth‚Äù..just lacking..no other way to put it.

name: KenS
review: We really enjoyed our dinner and the entire experience.  Food was very good as was the service. We enjoyed the garlic bread with a shared Ceasars Salad, a small tenderloin and a NY Strip and a shared bake potatoe. Too much food, but we managed.  We even shared a carrot cake....which really was more like a spice cake.  All and all we would certainly recommend!!!

name: NancyS
review:
We were so looking forward to our return trip to Michael Jordan‚Äôs.
Been here many times.
The menu has changed somewhat as has the decor, our server was great but our $120 porterhouse was way over cooked the Garlic Bread was cold
Salads changed too give it a 2 star mushrooms different and cooked terribly.
So disappointed

name: DEBS
review: Pricy for the quantity of food.  Filet mignon appeared to be 5 oz instead of 7 oz. Potato overcooked.  At $100 per person with tip, a diner expects more.  Just food for thought.

name: DKNYLI
review: Really had a fantastic meal. Julia our waitress was awesome and a great sport. Crab cake was expensive but absolutely outstanding. Big crowd but overall smooth experience. No complaints at all.

name: JoanneP
review: Allison the waitress was spot on. The steak, potatoes, bread and wine fabulous. Brussel sprouts flavor full, but tuff and chewy on many of them.

name: TammyT
review: My husbands steak was perfect, mine was way overcooked.  We had an awesome waitress

name: Steve
review: For what‚Äôs at casino it‚Äôs ok but prices high for okay food and lots of rowdy gamblers

name: NickW
review: Had all the oysters, crab cake, and tuna tartar for appetizers. All were great. Crab cake was best I ever had. Shared the mvp option with my group. Fantastic. Tried each dessert. Amazing display and taste!

name: williamg
review: Best steak I have had in a very long time -45 day aged delmonico - ordered the suave that comes with Waygu - Brussels sprouts and fries - incredible meal thanks

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Our previous experiences were so so good.  Our favorite place.  This time was good but not as before.  We will definitely come back.  The service by Melissa was impeccable.

name: KKGG
review: I‚Äôve been to this restaurant many times. I usually love it. This time the service was very sub par.

name: vman465
review: Michael Jordan's as always is great. But now they dramatically increased their prices on pretty much all the item on their menu. The Crab cake use to be $20. Now it's $40. Insane!

name: kd2000
review:
One of my all-time favorite restaurants.  The food, the service, and the location are hard to beat.  They have a fantastic wine list, the steaks are always cooked flawlessly, and the garlic bread with warm blue cheese fondue over is required (well, t
It should be).

name: YumQuest
review: Never disappointed from the host/ess staff to the wait staff they aim to please and make it the most enjoyable experience. The food is always done perfectly, even when super busy... family of 6 celebrating a few things and we had the best time. Great cocktails, delicious food and a server who added to the enjoyment. We will be back soon!

name: SelinaB
review: It was our first time dining at MJs. We enjoyed every aspect of it and our server was excellent!

name: EricW
review: Amazing place. The staff are great, the food was delicious

name: StephenM
review: Satisfying

name: Robert
review: Food was excellent and waitress was awesome

name: OpenTable Diner
review: 50th Birthday and it was perfect! Thank you

name: ALLISONM
review: When I made my reservation, I put in a special request.  To show my request was acknowledged, we received a glass of champagne.  Started the dinner off perfectly.

name: Kristine
review: The food was amazing and service excellent. I only had one complaint, it was quite dark inside. The table next to us used their cell phones for a long time looking over menu and ordering. It was absolutely blinding us. I felt the manager should have addressed this. Otherwise, food and service amazing!!

name: MichelleT
review:
Such a terrible experience. We really thought that we were choosing the best place for my husbands birthday. 
Needles to say they didn‚Äôt even put a candle in the cake. Just came and placed it on the table. My son (3 years old) wanted a cheeseburger from the Michael Jordan sports bar next door and they said they wouldn‚Äôt let him eat it in their restaurant. My server flat out said no and then said he would ask a manager. I even offered to buy a full adult entree for him, if the problem was that they felt they were loosing out on the money. 
Only when I said I was closing my bill out and leaving (at this point only drinks had been ordered) did the manager come out and say that they would accommodate and they even brought the burger over themselves. At this point my head was spinning, and my three year old was crying from confusion and hunger. 

The only good thing that happened was that my husband actually enjoyed the steak he ordered. My mothers meal was so salty that she couldn‚Äôt eat it. My stuffed lobster was okay, but cold. And my son did enjoy his burger finally. We all wished we had gone to the sports bar instead when we saw his burger. üôÇ

Would never put my kids in this situation ever again.

name: Steve
review: Absolutely amazing food and service, from the appetizers to entrees to the side, best meal I‚Äôve had

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Absolutely love this place. Slam dunk (see what I did there?), every time. It‚Äôs been ages since I had been back and it was exactly as I remember it. Flawless experience. Thank you Melissa & Angel for an amazing birthday dinner!

name: MariaG
review:
Food was excellent!
Ambiance was wonderful!
Will definitely be back!

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Very good .. Love the garlic bread our server was awesome one hiccup but was corrected right away

name: DianeM
review: Steak entree's excellent - but so are the other options such as their chicken and shrimp dishes[

name: PaulP
review:
Everything about this restaurant was amazing. Our server Kate was awesome and took very good care of us.
I would recommend this restaurant 100%

name: KatieT
review: AMAZING!!!  We tried the steaksmanship series and it was amazing!  Best steaks I have had in a long time.  Service was perfect, atmosphere was perfect, drinks where perfect, everything was perfect!

name: BigJohn
review: Really happy with our experience here!  Waitstaff was friendly, courteous, and on point with timing/accuracy/etc.  That's not always the case especially with COVID staffing challenges but these guys were excellent!  The somm was very helpful and I didn't feel I was upsold on wine my palate can't appreciate.  We ate like pigs headed to the slaughter.  Shrimp cocktail were huge and fresh.  The Nueske's double smoked bacon is insanely good; next time I'll ask for it to come with the steak instead of as an app but it's one of those flavors you cannot get out of your mind for all the right reasons.  The Caesar salad was fresh and a good attempt to be "healthy" between our 2 gluttonous courses.  The Mrs had the filet (cooked perfectly) and I the scallops (incredible sides on the plate), so a nice little surf&turf when the sharing begins.  The creamed spinach was lights out - toe to toe with any high end steakhouse offering.  We will be back and can't wait to explore the rest of the menu.

name: RichardT
review:
Staff was very accommodating 
Food was out quickly

name: SSGG
review: Our waiter was extremely considerate.  We were a group of 4 and 2 had show tickets.  He accommodated our need to get two in/out within an hour and he did this without making us feel rushed.  Great meal - it is always a pleasure to dine with you.  We LOVE the newly renovated space.  Nice job!

name: MichaelR
review: Michael Jordan's Restaurant is just simply the best! You are definitely getting your money's worth, inclusive of the outrageously delicious food to the fantastic service.

name: DorothyB
review:
MJs is very classy under the direction of their Manager, Dallas
He made us feel welcome with his big smile and as busy as he was he made the time to chat to make sure all was good

name: Sista
review: Absolutely  delicious Fiket Mignon and asparagus and mashed potatoes. Cocktails were so good and Garlic bread to die for. Chocolate cake decadent.Service was excellent! 5 star experience.

name: TommyZ
review: Excellent excellent excellent

name: Thomas
review:
My wife and I visited the restaurant on 11/7 to celebrate our 41 year anniversary.
We did so to experience the reputation for serving the best steaks. The staff and service was outstanding. However, my steak was difficult cutting and generally tough. The pricing should reflect the quality of the product. This was not the case here. I had decided leave a message on the restaurant website. Unfortunately, the contact link does not work so I am posting here. We were truly disappointed.

name: RobinT
review: Fabulous service! Food is wonderful but be prepared to pay. If you don't mind paying for excellence this is the place to dine!

name: SalvatoreR
review: Food was amazing. Our server Robert went above and beyond to make our experience over the top! Little bit noisy but it was a Saturday night at the casino so it was expected. Overall, a great place!

name: DavidL
review: Everything was excellent!!! Made our 13th Wedding Anniversary a memorable one!!!

name: ANTONIOV
review: Great food, great service, friendly staff. Best to make reservations if going on the weekend.

name: KellieN
review: Fabulous food and service! Would definitely go again and recommend this restaurant

name: Catlover1957
review: Fabulous dinner. Great service. Consistently great steaks.

name: Mike
review:
Apps: Garlic bread was great. Unique presentation with blue cheese dipping. Caeser salad was very disappointing. Not much of it and little flavor. Avoid that salad.

Entrees: Filet for me, asked for medium and received well done. Still edible, but not great. My wife had scallops and loved them.

Service: Great. Waitress was friendly and attentive. Great with refilling drinks without  having to ask.

Ambiance: Really loud, which doesn't typically bother me. One large party nearby had a loudmouth that could probably be heard from across the street. Not the restaurants fault. 

Overall: Good, but not great. Worth trying and I would go back again if I was in town, but not a priority as there are many restaurants in MS.

name: AlanC
review: Awesome!!  Great meal all around. Started with the garlic bread and a chopped salad followed up with the fillet with Mac & cheese and mushrooms. All amazing. Have not been to this place in about 15 years and like a fine wine improved age. Did I say Awesome?!!?! Just go there.

name: JohnR
review: Great good bit very expensive

name: ANTHONYP
review: Wife and mine  date nite

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Went for my husbands birthday with another couple and the 4 of us had the best meals ever!! Everything was absolutely delicious!! We will be back

name: MeganB
review: Everything at Michael Jordan‚Äôs Steakhouse was amazing! From the moment we walked in the service was nothing like I have experienced! The food was so fresh and absolutely delicious.

name: LeaL
review: T bone steak and trio of mashed potatoes was outstanding. Service was excellent - our server was friendly and helpful. Definitely an electric energy

name: BRIANS
review: This Was Our 8th Trip To Mj‚Äôs As Great As It Was The 1st Time.. My Wife And I Get The 10ounce Filets And It Was Perfect! We‚Äôll Be Back Soon. Thanks MJ‚Äôs!

name: ColleenG
review: I know MJ‚Äôs is popular and busy, I get that. Next time, when my husband and I order a martini, we want to be able to sit and enjoy our drinks together, without someone hovering over us asking if we are ready for our main meal. We received our martinis and within two minutes, our appetizers were on the table. We were still enjoying our appetizer and martinis, the waitress kept coming up and asking if we were ready for our dinner order. Once we had our meals on the table, our dinner was great. But it is so ‚Äúrush rush‚Äù to get people seated, drinking and eating and to get us out of there. If I am spending $400 on my and my spouses‚Äô meal, I don‚Äôt want to be rushed out within 45 minutes like our presence is an inconvenience. Especially if I have to make our dinner reservation two weeks in advance. MJ‚Äôs is always the best of the best, but they can‚Äôt expect people to place their whole dinner order within 10 minutes of sitting down.

name: Allison
review: Always our favorite restaurant when we visit Mohegan Sun. The service was impeccable (shoutout to Brian and Ryan) and the food was phenomenal. We highly recommend the crab cake appetizer (all crab, no filler), the 16oz Delmonico steak, and the 23 layer chocolate cake.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Great atmosphere, great service, really good food (although the steak I had could‚Äôve used a little salt.) I was a little disappointed with the amount of wine they poured.  I ordered a glass of Cab for 15-16 bucks and I barely got 5 ounces.

name: scott
review: Highly Recommended. Always great food and service.

name: Diversefid
review: Just too expensive. Been here many times, but I think I won't be going as often. Steaks are very good, but sides are $15+, steaks are $55+ and just not worth the money. The octopus app was good, a little saucy though. Service was a bit slow, the bread came late and they need to get more creative with cocktail menu. Decent wine list, but again, our tab was $260 before tip, for 2 people, 3 drinks total, one app and one side. 2 filets, one was "crusted" with blue cheese, but the crust was more like mush.

name: JeffreyB
review: Food was cooked well as specified, prices were high but expected.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: We have enjoyed dining at Michael Jordan steakhouse in the past. Our most recent experience was not that great. The food was not up to the usual standards.

name: ARSNV2015
review: My wife and I celebrated our anniversary at the restaurant. It has been a yearly tradition for the last 6 years and the staff never disappoints. We received congratulations from every staff member that we came in contact with. The food and service was fantastic as always. We recommend the restaurant to all of our friends and family.

name: JackieV
review: Everything was amazing! From our seafood platter appetizer to the Wagyu steak cooked to perfection to the baked Alaska to complete the meal. Service was great - Shout out to Tanya and Logan for taking care of us!

name: LbrownH
review: Nice meal in a very busy casino!  Enjoyed our meal

name: JenniferK
review: Delicious! Best steak my husband ever had. I had the lamb and it was amazing.

name: JenniferP
review: Excellent service and food. Velvet lined booth was beautiful and private. Thank you.

name: JohnK
review: The food was excellent the Delmonico steak was one of the best I have ever had appetizers were great can‚Äôt wait to go back my wife‚Äôs filet minion was cooked to perfection omg

name: ChristopherB
review: Really great food... a little on the pricey side but top of the line quality.  Great atmosphere, but on a busy Friday night the restaurant was very loud and it was a little difficult to hold a conversation without speaking up.

name: Rump
review: Excellent meal and service  Made for an enjoyable evening

name: ChrisG
review: For 2 people and $300 it should have been better. It was just ok.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Birthday dinner everything was amazing!

review:
Very special. Service and steaks !

name: KathyC
review: The steaks melt in your mouth and the cream sauce on the spinach was delicious.üòÄ

name: NatashaC
review: They have the best steak I ever had, but I wish they didn't take the Kansas City steak off the menu, I go once a month love it there.

review:
Super fast service.. food came quickly.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Excellence.

review: Steak is always excellent

name: TedG
review: Birthday Dinner
