review: Fantastic and attentive service! They gave my daughter a card for her birthday which was a nice touch! Food was outstanding,  as always. Such a memorable experience!

name: GreerJ
review: I brought my boyfriend here for his birthday. It was perfect! Customer service was excellent, the food was AMAZING! He loved it. I would absolutely recommend this restaurant to anyone looking for a grown and sexy place to celebrate any special occasion.

name: YaniraA
review: We really enjoyed ourselves for a quaint birthday dinner.  I highly recommend for special occasions.

name: JimC
review: Food was prepared perfectly and our waitress was great.  Will definitely come back

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Food was excellent

name: CesarSalad
review: Excellent service.

name: janetb
review: I personally do  not think the cost is equal to the quality.  However, it is a very nice place and I would think yes to come again.  Our waitress was extremely professional and very nice.  We liked her very much.

name: ScottH
review: All ways perfect, steak was cooked to perfection.

name: timetodine
review: Our dinner and our server - fantastic!  I‚Äôm not sure why they initially marked us as no-show.  We were a few minutes late but there were several in our party that were on time, and they refused to seat us.

name: JoeM
review: Great service, food was great.  Really enjoyed everything about this dinner & experience

name: dani
review:
Our go to restaurant every year.
Can't go wrong here.  NEVER a bad meal nor bad service.

name: SRob
review: Came here for husband's birthday.  The service was incredible, the food was outstanding, and we left absolutely overjoyed with the experience!

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Always an exceptional experience. The staff made our anniversary celebration special and catered to our every need. The food quality is outstanding, out of this world flavor in every bite. I mever leave this restaurant feeling anything else than completely forfilled and satisfied.

name: PaulS
review: Great meal, super service. A bit noisy with the music going on during dinner.

name: alan
review:
The food was outstanding. Service could not be any better. Did not feel rushed in anyway. 
Can hardly wait to go back.

name: VirginiaK
review: He shared porterhouse was very nice. Salmon was appreciated Mash potato trio you should try. I was disappointed with the French onion soup..(mine is better) and the potato trio was not warm. The Caesar salad was huge and the recommendation to split was excellent. The service and the staff were unbelievable. Brian was the best!

name: Durse
review: The best rib eye steaks anywhere - you haven‚Äôt lived until you eat at Jordan‚Äôs

name: llmc6294
review: A must !  Food is outstanding, the biggest shrimp I have seen in a long time.

name: Aleeminkler
review: Great place for apps! Our waitress was very friendly and took great care of us.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Awesome place! Everything about it is great!

name: JessicaS
review: Great service but a long wait even if you have reservations made ahead.

name: LarryM
review: Dallas and his team yet again went above and beyond! The food was absolutely delicious as always. Looking forward to our next visit.

name: AdamD
review:
Food was amazing, staff was outstanding and friendly. Made my husbands birthday complete getting Michael Jordan‚Äôs & staff signatures!! 

We had an amazing time!

name: OpenTable Diner
review: My husband and I had a yet another fabulous meal at Michael Jordan‚Äôs, as usual.  We both had the fillet, shared the mashed potato trio and creamed spinach‚Äîall were excellent.  Social distancing was observed and the noise level was low.  Service was perfect.  We had a great evening!

name: TerryS
review: Delicious food, cooked perfectly service was great.

name: LindaC
review: We had the best night and dinner, we were celebrating both our birthdays (2 weeks apart). We were treated to champagne and birthday desserts. Our food was exceptional and plenty of it.  Dallas and Swannie (?) were wonderful

name: OpenTable
review: Had the pleasure at being seated at our server Sara's table. She was very helpful in our dining choices including our cocktails and wine. Even though we were given a time limit at our table, we never felt rushed. She made us feel comfortable from the start. Next time we are back, I will ask to sit in her section. Bravo Sara!!!!!

name: Elsie
review: Seating was on time for our reservation and our server(Adrianne) was very pleasant, helpful, and not intrusive while we were enjoying our wonderful dinner. Another great evening at MJ.

name: Markb
review: The wait staff was great and described the menu and options this was a great help.  The drinks were good but way over priced. The food was really good but again over priced.

name: eickey
review: Great food and service. Seemed to due well with Covid cleanliness

name: EliotW
review: Took my wife there for her birthday and she really loved it. She was very pleased with the service that our waitress provided.

name: EdwardG
review: The Steak could have been much better considering the cost. We got the Porterhouse for 2. It was perfectly cooked but was  a bit tough and bland. Thank god for the sauces.  We had the mushroom and cream spinach  sides.

name: ChrisD
review: The service was excellent. The Filets were above average, but the sides were awful. Beer taps were broken so could not get a draft beer. Overall it was my 3rd time at Michael Jordan‚Äôs. This one was not a good one.

name: MatureYouth
review: Great steaks, drinks and servers. Go here if you want something a bit more upscale and sit-down.

name: Cathyfost
review: Everything was delicious except the lobster mashed potatoes.  The lobster wasn't very fresh.  I had to take Benadryl because it wasn't fresh.  Everything else was pretty good!

name: LisaF
review: The whole experience was incredible.  We got the steak flight and we highly recommend it

name: Curls
review: The food and service is superb! If your going to have dessert you have to try the Baked Alaska Wow. This restaurant is a must try for anyone visiting Mohegan Sun that is a foodie.

name: JasmineP
review: Best place love the food and environment. We had a great time.

name: SusanO
review:
Easter dinner for two
Table was near open door where there was foot traffic so did not give ambiance 5 stars
Food and service were great!

name: KimberlyC
review: Horrible experience for my Birthday. I had reservations for 9:15 and we were seated at 9:30. Very first words out of the waitress mouth was not to rush you guys but we close at 11 and everyone has to be out. Very unprofessional and made it seem like we had no choice but to rush to order. Our food came quickly, but the problem is, it was RUSHED. Nothing seemed fresh and well prepared. The food was a huge disappointment for the amount of money we paid. Ruined my whole Birthday dinner experience. I do not recommend this place.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Our favorite place to spend our hard earned money when we want to splurge. Server was incredible and the food was 10000000 % on point like always. Can't wit to go back

name: maryn
review: Eating at the bar is the best and this is our favorite place to eat !

name: CarolinaR
review: Enjoyed the food was excellent would return  best dinner ever

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Great meal and the service was excellent.

name: LarryS
review: Everything was wonderful!

name: Jeff
review: Once again MJ over delivers. Thank you to everyone for a great meal. Can‚Äôt wait to go back!

name: HJB2
review: Fantastic food and beverages ambiance romantic lighting soft music with a huge amount of good vibes in the atmosphere makes  for a very relaxed and fun dinner experience

name: johnd
review: Excellent service and great food. I recommend this restaurant for most any occasion.

name: MichaelD
review: A great night out!  The food was really good and our server was fantastic...keep it professional, yet light hearted.  Really an enjoyable, much needed night

name: MushroomStamp
review: Our server didn‚Äôt come right away, but she let us know she would be right with us. She did a great job, and was very pleasant and engaging. Food was delicious, and we‚Äôd definitely come back again.

name: Anna
review: Julie was a great waitress. Attentive and personable  food was great too

name: Brian
review: My steak was undercooked and by the time our server checked in, the rest of our party was done eating so I didn‚Äôt want another steak at that point. While clearing the table, our server spilled half a bottle of wine that cost $120 and was offered a glass of house wine rather than replacing the bottle that was spilled. For the minor inconvenience, the manager informed me she would comp a dessert  and a glass of house wine. This is by far the worst dining experience I‚Äôve ever had at a ‚Äúfine dining‚Äù establishment and would suggest going literally anywhere else. Terrible atmosphere, below average food, and atrocious service. Giving one star pains me but unfortunately there isn‚Äôt an option for zero stars.

name: FredM
review: this was a damn good meal with damn good service at price reasonable for what was served. Outstanding steak.

name: Nancy
review: Great service, didn‚Äôt feel rushed,  great food!

name: StaceyM
review: The steaks were delicious. The dinner rolls and cocktails were mediocre

name: Foodlover
review: We come here every year to celebrate my husbands birthday, never been disappointed.  Food is excellent, wait staff superb.

name: Carol
review: Adequate food in a very pleasant atmosphere.  A good "party spot" in Mohegan Sun.

name: Will
review: Very good food, great service. Prices were a little high but not crazy.

name: OpenTable Diner
review:
This is an amazing dining experience.  We loved the food, the service was impeccable and the atmosphere was superb!  We will be coming back soon!
Thank you for a great time!

name: Lainie
review: Short rib dish was tasty, as usual, and my husband had the lamb chops and said to they were delish.  He loved the dish

name: ljg61
review:
Best restaurant in Mohegan Sun. 
Steak was cooked perfect!. Mac & Cheese was delicious. 
Garlic Bread appetizer a "must have"

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Dallas the manager is such an asset to your business. He oversees  the staff and diners  and makes sure your evening is perfection!

name: Kennethf
review: We really wanted to love this place as we frequent the Mohegan Sun but its a step behind 2 of our favorite steak places in the area. First the good, the food was really good. I had the KC Strip and my wife had the New York strip. Both cooked to our preference of Medium Rare and seasoned perfectly. The Scallop appetizer was also very good. Our server Jennifer was attentive and friendly. Having said that we would of stuck around for desert or a after dinner drink but the noise was unbearable to endure any longer. Music was playing way too loud and of course guests had to speak over the music which made it even louder. It felt like a bar atmosphere and not a fine dining experience at all. We went pretty early too with a seating at 5:45 PM. All in all its likely we won't return.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Great service, great food, great times.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Everything was amazing as always. We can‚Äôt wait to come back for another delicious meal. Thank you

name: LarryM
review: Dallas and his team are awesome! We appreciate your friendship and company. We feel at home when we visit.  Our last visit was really great Simone our server was so nice. You‚Äôre lucky to have such a great team. We will see you next Friday.

name: ErinW
review: Dallas was wonderful and took care of us from even before we arrived. I had to add to the reservation last minute which he took care of right away, delivered a birthday card to my husband signed by all of the staff, and made sure we had a beautiful dessert to celebrate with. The entire experience was perfect and we appreciate it all. Thank you Michael Jordans Steakhouse AND DALLAS!

name: DurfBurfle
review: This was the perfect anniversary dinner! We were placed in a nice secluded booth on the side, a lovely card from the restaurant wishing us a happy anniversary, complimentary champagne toast... our server was wonderful, just the right amount of attentiveness, very knowledgable on the menu, and had no issues taking our photo or getting anything else we needed during the evening.  Worth every penny!

name: ChristopherT
review: Literally the best steak I‚Äôve ever had. I highly recommend to anyone and everyone

name: DanaS
review: Outstanding food and service. The ultimate steak experience

name: JanetB
review: We go here when we are in town.We love it .Food great and the service is wonderful

name: MillissaA
review:
It was ok for the steak. The mashed
Potatoes were amazing and the service was great.

name: ArletteL
review: Excellent service and food was amazing. Very nice dining experience.

name: LindaC
review: From the minute we walked in we were treated wonderfully with very friendly staff. Recommendations were honest and well received. We were not rushed at all. The food was WONDERFUL! My husband had the pork chop and is still raving about it. Our steak were cooked perfectly. Dessert was amazing and enough for two. We had requested a booth and it was perfect with pillows which helped my back. Can't wait to return!

name: ErinO
review: Great food and great service and our server Brian was great. The best steak I ever had. I am not sure if its because its inside a Casino or not but they should enforce some level or dress code at this place. Some patrons looked like they were up all night gambling and wearing pajamas.

name: DaveM
review: My delmonico ribeye was fantastic, probably the best ribeye I‚Äôve ever had. My wife‚Äôs filet was not good, Outback Steakhouse is better. Dry, no taste, tasted like pot roast. We didn‚Äôt like the garlic bread app, others rave about it but it just wasn‚Äôt to our liking. And strangely, the soda was horrible. Got a diet coke and it tasted like tab, asked for a sprite and it was just as bad.

name: MarkL
review: Michael Jordan's Steak House was fabulous. The food was delicious and the steak was made exactly the way we asked.  The potato trio was amazing, especially the lobster mashed. My family and I will definitely be back, next time we visit Mohegan Sun.

name: matthewh
review: Steak was really good, staff was very helpful and pleasant would go back

name: Rita
review: Porterhouse was delicious.  Spinach was a little salty

name: Larrylove1
review:
It was our 23 rd anniversary. And we thought celebrating at Mr. 23s establishment would make the night special. It exceeded.

Chris and Dallas went above and beyond

name: DavidC
review: excellent food, wait staff was great. we were 20 minutes early, and they were still able to immediately seat us. Great food.

name: RobinS
review: Service was outstanding, Brian our waiter was personable and very attentive. Food was delicious as usual which consisted of filet mignon and rib eye both were cooked to our desired preference and the sides were just as enjoyable. A bit pricey however the quality of meat is well worth it.

name: BingBing
review: Superb dining from the moment we arrived.  Alaskan king crab legs were succulent and delicious.  Wagyu steak melts in your mouth.  The wait staff were extraordinary and the service was impeccable.  Pricing cumulates with the environment.

name: KENNIEC
review: It was definitely not as good as I thought it would be the steaks were not hot when served which means the were probably sitting there for a while before being brought to us, and to be honest for the price I‚Äôve had much better steaks at other steakhouses. The ambiance and lighting was great but the noise level was awful.I could barely hear my girlfriend speak and that‚Äôs because many guest were behaving like it was a frat house , yelling and carrying on. For the amount of money there are certainly much better options.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: It was great.  Food was amazing and waitress was fantastic!

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Everything was amazing from service to food.

name: Blklab
review: First  time out In a year and a half so the seven of us celebrated all of our birthdays. We ask for special request to have all of us have a piece of the 21 layer cake with her names putting the plates and candles on it. Thank you so much for such a fun evening!!

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Going away dinner

name: ARTHURS
review:
We were disappointed to find no table available when we arrived at 7pm.  We waited about 15 mins outside the resturant, although we would have enjoyed having a drink while we waited.  No place to have a drink.

The steak we ordered was wonderful.

name: AdamM
review: Excellent food and service. Steak melted in our mouths. Pricey but that was expected. Would definitely go back.

name: jasonl
review: Always delicious. The filet and the lobster Mac and cheese are amazing!

name: Steph
review: We love eating at MJ steakhouse. Julie was an excellent waitress.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: My Husbad has been wanting to go here for years and finally got to try it.   The host set the tone for the evening by giving us a personalized Happy Anniversary card signed by the staff.  The waitress was amazing and the food was just as amazing.  It was perfect.

name: DonaldD
review: our server was excellent and the food is always top notch

name: MarciP
review: Dinner was fantastic, from apps to dessert. Our waiter was very attentive.

name: LarryM
review: Dallas and the staff are amazing we had a lot of fun the food is great see you in 2 weeks

name: Louise
review: My daughter's birthday was made very special by our server Sara ! She was helpful, polite, and just nice. The food was excellent as usual.  We thoroughly enjoyed our evening.

name: YanitzaG
review: This restaurant always leaves the best impressions! Hospitable hosts, delicious dishes, beautiful presentation, wide wine list and wonderful dessert. I recommend to everyone!

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Birthday dinner

name: TKO1
review: Everything was perfect. The wait staff were kind and accommodating. Excellent dining experience. The food was amazing as always. Restaurant was spaced out and felt safe.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Food and service was excellent!!

name: marym
review: So happy to be able to eat a great meal inside and safe.service was great.food always wonderful

name: BeverlyJ
review: I arrived early and the host was very friendly and advised me of the wait time I had to wait, she constantly kept me informed with what was going on! After they seated us she brought 2 glass of champagne for me and my husband. The food was AMAZING! We had the crab cake for our appetizer and let me tell you this was my first time trying crabmeat and this crab cake was so delicious I wanted to ordered another one but I didn‚Äôt want to spoil my meal. The filet was melting my mouth with lobster tail and lobster mashed potato it was amazing, my husband had a special they had with a strip steak with mash potato with lobster and scallops wrapped in bacon, the waitress was very attentive and friendly, I definitely recommend for special special occasion this place it OUTSTANDING. Can‚Äôt wait to visit again.

name: KristenC
review: The food was simply amazing.  Everything was outstanding.  Unexpected surprise ... the best macaroni and cheese!

name: ChrisC
review: Good food and drinks, great staff, moderately over priced.

name: JoyM
review: Awesome night out with friends! We arrived early for our reservation and were accommodated within a reasonable time frame for a busy Friday night. Our waitress Julie was friendly, engaging and on top of our order!

name: davids
review: Celebrated my wife‚Äôs birthday there again! The staff was great, gave us an awesome table and of course the food was amazing! We have celebrated our anniversary there in the past and have never left without being by blown away

name: KristinPezz
review: We had the Flight 23 Steakmanship. It was an amazing experience. Our servers Sara, Nancy and Ray were exceptional! Mj‚Äôs never disappoints! Thank you for such a great evening.

name: GaryP
review: At the price of the steaks it seems a little much to charge for side dishes.

name: MeaganC
review: We tried the braised ribs this time It was delicious as always

name: RayB
review: Overall was wonderful. The DelMonico steak was not very flavorful

name: GenaM
review: My husband and I ate here for the first time and had a wonderful experience! The service was excellent, the food was spectacular and the drinks spot on. It was lovely, had very comfortable chairs and even the music piped in was great! It was pricey but well worth it. I would highly recommend and hope to dine here again when we return to the Mohegan Sun.

name: EllenA
review: We come to Michael Jordan‚Äôs Steak House when we want to treat ourselves well. The food is delicious, the ambience great and our server Danielle was terrific. The quality is unsurpassed. We look forward to our next dining experience here

name: OpenTable Diner
review: My wife and I visit once a year, and the food and service is usually outstanding. The most recent visit was subpar to say the least. Food was ok, but the service was wholly lacking. I still left the customary twenty percent tip, but it definitely wasn't earned, especially in comparison to the prices culminating to an average bill of two hundred or more. Waitress attended to us once during our visit and refilled our drinks not during, but after we've completed our meals and appetizers. No excuse in this type of setting, even if the current environment of dining has changed, as the prices have not changed nor should the service.

name: Kyanna
review: Great place but the food was not good for the price we paid.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Service outstanding, Food outstanding!! Coming back for sure !

name: Bernardl
review: One of the best restaurants I eat at.  It has never been a disappointment. Waitstaff was excellent. Food was amazing. I cant wait to go back

name: PattyT
review: Fantastic meal.  Reserved a table, but got a seat at the bar.  Bartenders were friendly and staff was amazing.  Filet mignon was the best I ever had!

name: CynthiaM
review: Awesome food! Great service! Steak was amazing! Would definitely recommend.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: From the host right through dessert perfect. They did a superb job treating my girlfriend special for her 40th birthday. Our porterhouse was crusted with a perfect medium rare center the tri potatoes and creamed spinach where spot on. But I will say we are still debating over the lobster or the Gorgonzola mashed where the better of the three. If your looking to spend a little of your spoils from gaming this is the right choice. Thanks again for a memorable occasion.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Anniversary

name: christineg
review: Food was fantastic, our waitress Brandy was very friendly and wonderful. She gave us excellent service and made us feel like she wanted us there. The chef wrote in chocolate Happy Birthday on the dessert plate for my husbands birthday. They even brought an extra dessert for me, my birthday was the day before. Dallas  the manager came and greeted us and wished us happy birthday.  Dallas also had a rude person at the door who didn't have a reservation and handled him in a professional manner.  We will be going back.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Anniversary

name: OpenTable Diner
review: The hostess was so nice!!! The waiter was amazing and very knowledgeable! The food was delicious, and we will definitely be back!

name: Karen
review: We had an enjoyable meal despite this Covid monster creeping about...........the sauce that they serve with the garlic bread is divine...............

name: OpenTable Diner
review: We love this place! Every time we visit Mohegan we make sure to stop in. The garlic bread was amazing as always and the truffle parm crust on your steak is a must! This time we also got bacon wrapped scallops and were were probably the best I‚Äôve ever had.

name: BarbraB
review: The food was top quality.  Best cosmopolitan and best meatballs I have ever had!

name: JamesB
review: If you want a great steak come here. The prices are a bit high, but worth it for better quality.

name: LisaJ
review: We enjoyed every minute of our visit to this restaurant. Our waitress was extremely knowledgeable of the menu and made excellent recommendations for appetizers and side dishes that were delicious. We had the porterhouse for 2 and it was cooked and seasoned perfectly!! Definitely must visit if you have the opportunity.

name: GeorgiaB
review: Got the porter house for two and it was excellent!

name: JohnL
review: Everything was top notch in terms of presentation and flavor. Our server, Bryan, was attentive, gave us enough space and was spot on. I hope to come back again.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Food was wonderful and the service was excellent however our points have not registered on open table.

name: ChristianM
review: Food and everything was overall very good drinks was good but really what made the experience 10 times better , was our waitress we forgot her name but she was wonderful make sure everything was clean at all times explained everything to us and a great personality and a great face wonderful persona she had

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Everything was amazing, can‚Äôt wait to go back.

name: DorothyB
review:
Dallas knocked it out of the box again! He is so professional yet so warm and friendly. Dallas knows how to treat repeat customers especially when it‚Äôs their birthday!
We‚Äôll keep coming back... for sure. 
What an asset Dallas is to MJ!!!

name: OpenTable Diner
review: The food was great and are server was amazing. I put the noise level at moderate because the restaurant is in a casino so it can not be completely quiet as well as other people dining and the bar area. Despite that are server always made sure we had everything we need and the restaurant manager also asked us how everything was. So I felt respected and attended to.

name: ErinM
review:
Excellent service, excellent food and excellent wine.  The only issue are the patrons giving the staff a hard time about masks.  The  mental midgets who refuse to wear one are abusing the staff at places they choose to go, knowing full well the mandate is to wear masks. 


 I watched loser after pathetic loser show aggression and abuse towards the incredibly hard working staff at this establishement.  It was a sickening display of idiocy.  These people are seriously the dumbest people on the planet and deserved to have all the covid.  

I truly hope these incredible culinary artists have a company that appreciated them for what they do.

name: MatthewD
review: Excellent food excellent service equals excellent time we will definitely be back

name: LarryM
review: The team at Michael Jordan‚Äôs is superior than any restaurant I‚Äôve gone to. Dallas the general manager is tops a true professional anyone going to Mohegan sun needs to make reservations!!!

name: Hannah
review: Food and service were excellent. It‚Äôs pricey but worth it for a treat!

name: Happylife
review: Bday. It was amazing. They received us a d walk us to the table where there was a bday card sigo from the staff. That was great. And at the end a brownie with a candle for  my husband. It was above abs beyond. He surely felt special.

name: Briggs5602
review:
The staff were great and helped make a wonderful evening and 42nd wedding anniversary
The steaks were wonderful and we'd highly recommend the mashed potato trio. We can't wait to come back.

name: KaiC
review: Appetizers: French onion soup taste so good.Crab cake and bacon scallops is amazing. Steak and migon taste very good.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Friendly staff and food was great. Steaks were cooked to perfection.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Fantastic experience while at Mohegan Sun.  Money well spent.

name: AricS
review: Great experience for a high end meal. Highly recommend.

name: Danielb
review: The food was great the service was the best will go back again!

name: Dinner
review: We had a Great time and our waitress was fantastic. Everyone was very pleasant and attentive. We love coming in to see the staff and Management. Wonderful special surf and turf.

name: HenryS
review:
One of my favorite places to dine when at Mohegan Sun. 

I am a creature of habit and I always get the jumbo lump crab cake (did so thsi time) and the NY Strip. This time our server Adrian mentioned the Wagu special that came with surf and turf option. Glad she did cause it was out of this world! My only wish is that this would make it's way to the regular menu items.

name: Xiony
review: Everything we had was perfect . Definitely coming back for the crab cake!

name: BreAnneH
review: Excellent service,  great food and an amazing vibe. I'll definitely be coming again!

name: AllanaR
review: I celebrated my birthday here and it felt so personal, like I was part of the MJ family.

name: Robss
review: Waygu ny strip special was amazing. Garlic bread onion soup Mac cheese all outstanding. Perfect service from Jen and lovely manager checked in twice. Eat here often and was best visit

name: EricS
review: Delmonico, Mashed Potato Trio and Cream Spinach superb once again and as it was the time before and the time before that and so on...highly recommend!

name: CHARLES
review:
A Pleasure 5 Stars well deserved !
Service was outstanding.
Will recommend to family & friends .

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Everything was perfect!

name: AlicjaD
review: We had a great dinner with our friends for my husband‚Äôs birthday. Food and dessert was delicious. Our waitress was amazing .

name: StephanieR
review: Food was amazing, service was great. No wait time with reservations! 10 out of 10 will recommend!!

name: CoachFcks
review: Our server Jimmy was amazing and everything he recommended was a home run.  Food was phenomenal from start to finish.  Couldn‚Äôt have been more impressed!

name: Slix
review: This was our 4th time dining at Michael Jordon's Steakhouse at Mohegan Sun. It has been consistently great every visit. The food and the staff are always fabulous. It's not a cheap diner, but it's worth the splurge and has become a tradition for us every time we're at the casino.

name: Kylie
review: Amazing food. Never disappoints! Make sure you get the tower of garlic bread!

name: EllaP
review: Absolutely love the team, service and food! They made my birthday so special, such a great place for any celebration. If for ANY reason something isn't perfect, they will make it right. Dallas is a huge asset, MJ would be pleased! He connects with each customer, so pleasant and makes sure you enjoy your time. Service is always top notch, just love this place.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Food was okay.   Potato trio wasn‚Äôt that great.  Steaks cooked to specs.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: The food was terrible I don‚Äôt think I will go back

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Great service .. food was disappointing for the price ..

name: NickP
review: From the hotest to the service and the food was fantastic. I would recommend to all my family and friends. we make this our stop for dinner.

name: jamesb
review: We had a Great meal in a quiet and atmosphere was great

name: annar
review: I found bones in both of my meals I was not satisfied and I feel like the entire experience should have been comped. I was there to celebrate a new job for my boyfriend who I was trying to take out for an excellent experience and was greatly disappointed. I will not return to this establishment.

name: Phil
review: Happy with restaurant highly recommended !! Excellent food and service

name: TomD
review: Excellent service, food and drinks as usual. It was my daughters 21st birthday and she was made to feel extra special

name: KenM
review: Even with all the craziness that‚Äôs going on, another fantastic dinner at Michael Jordans. Service was spot on, food was great. Kudos once again.

name: HannahH
review: Better than I expected and I will be returning. Everything was great...

name: WaeelS
review: We were seated inside one of the few booths available.  It was very nice!  I was displeased with the limited menu.  No vegetables or baked potato were available.  They also had no kids menu available.  My steak was served just warm, and burnt on the outside.  I like my food served hot.  I will not be returning to Michael Jordon‚Äôs!

name: HenryS
review:
Open table reservation made it so easy. Walked right in (line for those who did walk-in) and was seated in 3 min from arrival. The dinning area is spaced so felt very comfortable.

Nancy our wait staff was friendly and took the time to explain to my gf (first time there) how the steaks are aged.

Apps came out in less than 7 min. Food is always great which is why I keep going back.

Extra nice touch is the dessert (we did not order) when they found out it was her birthday. Classy!

name: Danielb
review: Brought my lady for her Birthday they really know how treat people gave her a card & dessert with a candle no charge every one was very friendly highly recommend  .

name: JoanM
review: I wanted to celebrate my 50th birthday at a phenomenal steak house and booked Michael Jordan‚Äôs. We arrived 15 min prior to our reservation time and we were asked to wait outside, understandable as they were seating other people ahead of us. So, we went and grabbed a drink across the hall and returned 15 min later. The maitre‚Äôd was very aggressive and obviously takes his job and COVID very seriously as he screamed my last name to get our attention to seat us, walked at an expeditious rate to the table, and all but tore my husbands head off when he inadvertently put his hand near his mask to repeat an answer to his question that neither of them heard making the experience of seating us extremely uncomfortable. His banter of ‚Äúrules‚Äù was also uncomfortable during the seating process and frankly made the rest of the evening uncomfortable and unenjoyable. Especially when he came back to check on us....was he going to reprimand us again?? Overall, not what we expected for spending that much money. The server however, was a joy. And therefore the 3 stars. He gets none.  Not going back if he is there in the future.

name: LarryM
review:
I‚Äôm at a loss for words I felt like we were having dinner with friends. Dallas  is amazing!  The staff is great and very accommodating. We will be back on 2/12 the anniversary of our first date 42 years ago! See you soon!
Best 
Larry and Susan

name: Superb
review: Made a reservation at Micheal Jordan‚Äôs through Open Table since I had a $10 reward from Open Table due to the many reviews I‚Äôve made for them over the years.  Our waitress Jen was outstanding!  She was the highlight of the evening.  The food and bottle of wine were good.  The problem arose when we went to pay the bill and the manager approached our table with the $10 Open Table reward voucher saying it didn‚Äôt work and he couldn‚Äôt get through the phone number.  He asked to see my phone app that stated I had this reward, which I did.  He agreed it was there but instead of taking it off my bill, he said ‚ÄúI‚Äôll take $10 off your next visit‚Äù.  What kind of cheap response is that?  I just spent over $300 for a meal for 2 people and he won‚Äôt give us the $10 coupon?  It‚Äôs not about the $10, it‚Äôs the way we were made to feel like we were trying to cheat this establishment.  Ruined the entire experience.  This will be my last review on Open Table because according to the manager at Micheal Jordan‚Äôs Steakhouse at Mohegan Sun, their reward cards don‚Äôt work.

name: Diningoutalot
review: Great service and everything was delicious. The pork chop was the best!

name: Davidshoobie
review: Filet was great sides of Spanish and asparagus were great  Dinner rolls good too not a fan of the garlic bread although a lot seem to like !!!!

name: EleanorF
review: Everything was perfect! From the moment we were greeted at the door to the time we left, customer service was astounding.I even got a signed birthday card from MJ and staff! So freaking neat!

name: marisola
review: Great food as always porterhiude for 2 best choice

name: DAWNS
review: We have been there numerous times and every time was very good except for this last time.   We ordered the porterhouse which is what we usually get.  It tastes and looked like it had been cooked twicd

name: Dawn
review: Fantastic food and service, this is a gem at Mohegan Sun. Thanks for bringing my home city Chicago out East. Highly recommend the crab cake appetizer!

name: LarryM
review:
Dallas and his staff are amazing they treat you like your the only one in the restaurant back on Friday to enjoy it all over again 
See you Friday Dallas!
Larry and Susan m

name: CatherineH
review: It was a great meal, good to get out!  Service was pleasant and efficient, thank you Robert!

name: Jasmine
review: This place never disappoints the service and food was spectacular.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Beautiful experience, food was exceptional!

name: PeterZ
review: It was New Year‚Äôs Eve and a 30 minute wait. But let me tell you, it was incredible! I ordered the surf and turf special.The filet melted in my mouth and cooked perfectly. The scallops wrapped in bacon were delicious. They were so large that I had to cut into four pieces. The lobster mashed potatoes were the best and had so much lobster, it could‚Äôve been a meal on its own. The server Ryan was great. Attentive and personable. The hostess had sent two glasses of champagne and a garlic bread appetizer as a thank you for waiting so patiently. It was overall a five star meal!

name: jeannieh
review: My husband and I both had steak. He ordered his medium and it arrived very rare. Both steaks were tough. Very disappointing.

name: PALM4Kids
review: NYE.  Steak was top notch, one of the best I have had in a while. The sides were not great.  Apps were okay.

name: LorraineR
review: We had a great New Years dinner! Our waiter Robert was excellent! The food was delicious and the drinks were awesome!

name: meskaf
review: Friendly staff and great food.  So nice to be out after being locked up for so long, it felt very  safe.  Highly Recommend.

name: DonaldS
review: I had the best experience on New Years eve. The Waite staff were fantastic as well as our waitress! I eat here as least 4 times a year,  and always leave here pleased.  This was no exception.

name: AmyB
review: New Years eve

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Delicious!   It has been our New Year‚Äôs Eve treat for many years.  Now that our children are older they come with us.  We all look forward to it all year!

name: Lainie
review: Food and service are top notch.  My husband has had the roast chicken the last two times we visited and he said it's the best he's eaten, and I love their steak with smothered onions, so yummy.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Food is good, menu has reduced greatly. Not a lot of choices.

name: SanjayR
review: Was treated like a VIP from the moment I entered to celebrate a birthday! Received a card signed by the staff, a candle on the dessert and just the right amount of attention from the waiter. Looking forward to my next visit!

name: Christina
review:
Overall we had a great experience...
I ordered a surf and turf special (In-bone filet, mashed potatoes with a lobster, scallops wrapped in bacon)- I asked for the steak medium well- unfortunately it was not done that way. The manager was nice enough to remake my steak. We asked for the bill and the remade steak to be boxed because it had taken over 35 minutes for them to remake it. It was late and we were tired as we had been there for about an hour and a half already. The manager wanted to see the bill before the server brought it over (which is what our server told us). We waited another 20 minutes and the server brought our check and told us that for the inconvenience the manager took off $56 which we were surprised by.  Upon looking at the check the manager took off the steak that he redid and a $13 inconvenience fee. We mentioned it to the server and he apologized for incorrectly explaining it to us. It was unfortunate. I wish the manager had addressed it himself and felt that it was important to correct the issue in a more timely manner. We had an overall good time but this left a sour taste and I'm not sure that we would return. One thing I will boast about is their incredible garlic bread- best I've ever had! It is an actual menu item that must be ordered as an appetizer.

name: james
review: One of the best, you never get credit for using open table

name: Nadya
review: excellent place Very delicious dinner and atmosphere

name: Ally
review: Everyone there was nice.  My only complaint was I requested a birthday dessert to be delivered to our table for a birthday surprise but i guess nobody read that note. They did put out a card but the dessert was what I wanted.

name: DeniseA
review: Excellent food!!! Excellent service..can't go wrong!!!

name: OpenTable Diner
review: My wife and I dined here Christmas eve.  The food was delicious.  The best prime rib I ever had. The garlic bread with the blue cheese fondue was excellent. Ryan our waiter was great!

name: Jcharm
review:
My wife and I had a date night dinner. Perfect as always at mjs

name: ALANL
review: Great bar staff

name: OpenTable
review: Great way to celebrate our wedding anniversary. We started at the bar with some classic cocktails being served by Brad & Tom. They were both friendly and we had an enjoyable conversation. Next we were seated in a very cozy booth and had a fabulous dinner. At the end of meal, we received 2 glasses of champagne as an anniversary toast. Will be back on our next visit to Mohegan Sun.

name: AndyS
review: I already did this and never received a response why bother.

name: Islander
review: We had an amazing dinner for a party of four. We highly recommend the garlic bread, the salmon, the Mac and cheese, the creamed spinach and , of course, the Porter House.  The service was wonderful as well.

name: JasonR
review: outstanding. Food & service was excellent and above expectations

name: MissB
review: The service was great.  We were celebrating a birthday and they did an amazing job.

name: MSHOST
review: Everything was excellent

name: LisaG
review: The food was delicious, Sarah our waitress was awesome and they were so kind to help us celebrate our 10 year anniversary üíï

name: JOHNP
review: We are never disappointed when we dine at your steak house. Always consistently excellent. Looking forward to our next dinner there.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Our experience was fabulous from the second we walked in the door. Our waiter Jimmy & the rest of the staff were amazing. Jimmy was so helpful while explaining the specials and making sure we had what we needed the entire time. We were celebrating my husband's birthday and I left a simple message on our open door reservation. MJs steakhouse went above and beyond to make his dinner extra special. Beyond the great service, The food was awesome, flavorful and well prepared. I highly recommend this restaurant, it's the total package.

name: LarryM
review:
Dallas and team were amazing. The chef came out to meet us and that was nice of him 
thank you 
Larry and Susan mollicone

name: AnthonyS
review: The signed birthday card was a very nice touch! Will definitely be back again!

name: JeffreyC
review: Love this restaurant the food and service outstanding. We had dinner there a year ago and had one of the best meal ever. We looked so forward to going again. They pulled it off and we had the Legendary Flight off the menu. Thank you. Will be there again.

name: JackG
review: Everything was perfect. Jimmy was our server and he was terrific. He was extremely personable and equally knowledgeable. His attention to detail added a special element to our dining experience. We are certainly looking forward to our next visit.

name: RachaelC
review:
Overall, we enjoyed our visit to MJ's. I took my husband for his birthday. The server was amazing and attentive. Ny food was pretty good. My husband wasn't really a fan of his steak. He had been talking about it for weeks, and he seemed really let down. He didn't really eat his steak. All of our other food was delicious. For dessert we ordered the creme brulee, which is one of our favorite desserts. It tasted odd. We still ate it. But it just didn't taste like creme brulee. 

We will definitely go back again at some point. Very likely we wont order the same meal again. Might give the creme brulee another chance.

name: Chrissy
review: I feel  just repeat myself everytime I write a review.  THE BEST!!!!!  These people get it.  Bet steak hands down and the staff are the most friendly, inviting staff.  They make you feel like you are sitting down a table with family.  Miss Yak though the manager.  He was the best!!!!!!

name: Lainie
review: One word. Fabulous.  Food is great and service is top notch.  You will not be disappointed.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: First time here and from entry, sitting down, and presentation by our waiter, was excellent. The appetizers to our main course to the wonderful steaks was on point and didn‚Äôt disappoint. If I had to give one negative, it would be that the crumbs that are cleaned up usually after meals at other fine restaurants, was not scraped off the table. But besides that, excellent service and excellent food.

name: stevet
review: all good but always seems to be someone real loud near us

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Great food. Terrific service.  However, super over priced.   I‚Äôm not a penny pincher by any stretch of the imagination, but not worth the money.  Thanksgiving day, only my wife and I.  Three drinks, 2 appetizers, 2 entrees, 2 sides.......$240.00.   Wow!!!

name: April1
review: Salad, fondue and steak couldn‚Äôt have been better.  I would rate them as excellent.  However, the lobster mashed potatoes were very dry.  We ordered the lobster potatoes in the past and they were delicious.  This wasn‚Äôt the case on our last visit.

name: Caroln
review: Wonderful non traditional TGiving dinner.  Had the first 3pm reservation and appreciate that you opened the doors at 3pm and not later. Only complaint which we did not order (did order the last two years in a row). The shrimp in the shrimp cocktail are too big, too tough and so ice cold they almost taste frozen. Did not order because of that reason. Wish you had a little more vegetarian on the menu. My daughter does eat lobster so you always give her two tales which works for us   Great waiter can not remember his name. Tall, good looking, older (haha older meaning 40?). Excellent service!

name: RogerD
review: Always a great time, with great steaks and great service!

name: Nakeisha
review: My now fianc√© and I celebrated our engagement here and we were very pleased . Our server was very attentive and overall I loved the ambiance . Although we did not have steak that night , the other food choices we had were very yummy . My fianc√© had the short rib and I opted for Caesar salad with shrimp . Very fulfilling and the drinks were on point . We visit many restaurants not to mention  steakhouses  and this place is  definitely is on  list. Wouldn‚Äôt mind visiting again.

name: PatriciaFletcher
review: I was not impressed with the food at all. The service was wonderful our waiter couldn‚Äôt of been more accommodating and nicer the concierge‚Äôs was great as well. We had some issues with our mashed potatoes and they did the right thing but overall I wouldn‚Äôt go back I was not impressed with the quality of the food for the price

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Sensational

name: Robss
review: Eat here often. Always very good. This particular evening it was outstanding. Filet garlic bread onion soup Mac and cheese wine all amazing. Perfect service from Jimmy. Lovely manager checked on my satisfaction twice.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Great service, amazing food.

name: KayM
review: The food was phenomenal and the service was amazing! Always a go to when we visit Mohegan Sun!

name: tlp1022
review: Whenever we dine at Michael Jordan's, the food is always great and the staff is always informative and professional Definitely repeat customers!

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Been many times this was not one of our better visits .. The garlic bread one the reason I love to go to MJs steakhouse was over cooked .. My wife's steak was under cooked and had to be sent back .. The service was great

name: MariaL
review:
Awesome service and food! Pricey but we all enjoyed it- our waiter was good, knew the menu and gave suggestions!
Would definitely return.

name: Brian
review: I have eaten here before and the food was excellent along with the service. I look forward to going each time.

name: Eddie
review: Amazing experience again. This was our 5th visit to Michael Jordan but this visit was to celebrate our daughters bday. Great service and food was really good.

name: crissy
review: Everything was great!

name: AndrewC
review: 40 year wedding anniversary

name: RichardN
review: IT IS EXPENSIVE BUT WORTH EVERY CENT!  We try and go on our anniversary and this year it was our 52nd year of marriage.  This was probably the 5th time we've been to Michael Jordan's Steak House and the food NEVER disappoints!  Oh and our anniversary Manhattan's - the very best!  Hope to go again in the future.

name: EricS
review: The food is excellent drinks clean definitely will go again.

name: ErikB
review: The staff at MJ's Steakhouse is truly exceptional.  We attended for our wedding anniversary and the team went above and beyond to make our night extra special.

name: MichaelT
review:
This restaurant is always consistently great!
The steaks are obviously their strength, but several menu items are outstanding.
Their wedge salad is among the better ones that I‚Äôve had and they have one appetizer and one side dish that are out of this world.
The double cut bacon appetizer is delicious and something you don‚Äôt see on any other menu.
And their side of Mac‚Äô n cheese uses 4 different cheeses and is the best I‚Äôve ever tasted.

name: TiffanyG
review: Food and service was excellent!!! Happy I choose to celebrate my 40th at Michael Jordan‚Äôs Steakhouse!!!!

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Meiosis was outstanding.

name: StephanieD
review: Always enjoy coming here!! Great food friendly service.

name: Jenn
review: It was our anniversary. We received complimentary champagne and a very nice card.

name: SHARONS
review: Had a wonderful time even thought enough to let us toast with free champagne for our anniversary dinner. Thank you

name: RichardM
review: Very friendly and professional service. My wife and I had a great time and enjoyed the food. Thanks MJs

name: DianeH
review:
We did the crab cake, bone in filet and the demonic.

Absolutely delicious.

Tried the spinach side.

Not a fan.

I'll stick with the fries for next time but ya gotta try...right?

As always...a wonderful dinner.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Family get together

name: Maria
review: Delicious Filet Mignon! Waiter was attentive and we enjoyed our drinks and meal!

name: Kelwal67
review: Excellent service as always. Food was amazing. Waiter anticipated everything we needed before we needed it.  The blue cheese garlic bread keeps us coming back time after time.

name: MarioG
review: The waiter was fantastic! He described the food and made great recommendations! The steaks were OK, cooked very well, meaning good however the sides were little to be desired. Specifically wasting your money on the lobster mashed potatoes, they had no taste at all they were dry and not worth it! We had the pork belly appetizer which was very good, could‚Äôve been a little better prepared as it was a little tough but the taste was very good!

name: KathiriaC
review: Service was amazing and very friendly! The place was clean and beautiful.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Always a fabulous time at MJ! We had Brian as our server, he was so knowledgeable! It was my friends birthday and they had a birthday card for her when we were seated, and a complementary mini dessert at the end. The bartenders are always amazing  especially Shirley who makes me delicious mocktails since I‚Äôm preggo. Ryan the expo always has a smile on his face and makes sure the food comes out hot and perfect. Chief always does an amazing job, food is always consistent. Whether it‚Äôs a solo dinner, date night or celebration this place is the spot to go!

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Me and my boyfriend went for our anniversary and everything was outstanding . We can‚Äôt wait to come back. Our waitress Simone was great!!

name: Foodlover
review: We always have dinner at Jordan‚Äôs when we stay at Mohegan Sun.  The best food and service. Makes your dining experience  feel special.  Our server ‚ÄúSimone‚Äù was exceptional.  Food ( we shared the 23 oz ribeye) was superb.

name: SPANKY
review: We have eaten here before and always thoroughly enjoyed the experience.  However, this time was not nearly as good as in the past.  The steak was not as tender and for the price spent it should be.

name: LisaC
review: Very soothing atmosphere friendly staff food was amazing service was awesome.

name: LaurieW
review:
Great food and atmosphere for celebrations and casual dinner.
We enjoyed it very much. Great job!

name: NicoleT
review:
What a great experience.  From friendly,  informative service to amazing food.  The atmosphere was upbeat and fun. You could also dine in a more quiet dining room. 
We were shocked when we received the bill how affordable it was.
We would definitely go back next time we are at Mohegan.

name: DennisG
review: Reservation was honored. The service was good nothing special. The entrees  portions were a little small

name: LarryM
review: Dallas and his staff are amazing.  I can‚Äôt wait to go back on 11/22 it can‚Äôt come fast enough!!!

name: SusanK
review: Location, noise, all service, drinks, appetizers, ambiance all very good. Menu variety was ok, should add a few more budgeted items in both apps and entrees. Everything is ala carte as they politely tell you ahead of time, (thank you). The trio of mashed potatoes were awesome and the Filet Mignon 7 oz with Shrimp was half good. Two large shrimp, coated well and an overdone steak that somehow was pink in the middle still but dry and not seasoned. It was a 7 oz that looked like 3 oz and after two slices was hard to ask to take it back. People LOVE this restaurant, I was not fond of paying that much on every item and not proportioned to that cost. All staff persons were awesome! To sum this visit...for two ...we had 2 drinks ea, shared app and dessert and ordered the same 'special' and was a $300 bill (tip not included yet). Went once, I'm good....well unless if I win big and want to splurge would give it a second try because so many people do rave about it.

name: wayne
review: Always a good meal.

name: BCNY
review: Food never disappoints

name: sara
review: Great dinner , food was delicious. Wait staff very attentive and courteous. Love the ease of reservations

name: DianeH
review: We had the Steakmanship platter.  My Lord thats an incredible meal!

name: EileenG
review: Celebrated a friends birthday and food was delicious and our server Jess was fantastic!

name: MikeK
review: Was surprised to find Michael Jordan steakhouse offered a certificated A5 Japanese Wagu steak on special as it is very rare to find this type of beef at restaurants in the U.S.. The steak was excellent!

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Absolutely solid all the way around. Steaks cooked perfectly! They say sides are enough for two, but their not. Service impeccable. Never had a bad meal here! Bravo to the staff.

name: Atlantiskat
review: One of the best meals we ever had.   Service was perfect.   Worth every penny

name: Elsie
review: Our server Brian was terrific. Great martini(liked the olives served on the side) The special filet with scallops and lobster mashed potatoes was awesome. A great anniversary dinner.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Always great

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Best Meal! Filet cooked to perfection, asparagus amazing and crispy French fries with truffle oil.

name: jennifera
review: Always a delicious meal and great service!

name: LizGoody
review: We had a reservation, but ended up camping out at the bar.  Food quality and presentation was fabulous.  Bartender had great menu knowledge and made fantastic recommendations.  On par with some of the best restaurants we have visited.

name: Loulou
review: I‚Äôve been going to MJ is for years. Always consistent good service. Steaks are sometimes hit or miss but overall you won‚Äôt be disappointed.

name: lalafrance
review: Past visits were much better in regards to food.  Porterhouse for 2 @32oz. Definitely was not enough for 2

name: Chrissy
review: Michael Jordan gets steak. I have gone hundreds of times to this establishment and have never been disappointed. If you want a good steak come to Michael Jordan‚Äôs

name: MargaritaMJ
review: Excellent meal. 4 instead of 5 stars because it is a bit over priced. We dined for my husband's birthday. We were greeted with a birthday card and seated at a cozy both. Our server, JessMac made our entire experience that much better. She was amazing.  Shout out to her!  We had garlic bread with a blue cheese dipping fondue and wedge salad. Both were amazing! The bacon on the salad was hearty and flavorful, the lettuce crisp & tender and wonderful dressing. We had the special for dinner,  2 oz of lobster scampi and 3 jumbo bacon wrapped scallops with a 7 oz filet. Everything was cooked to perfection.  My Margarita was delicious and had a nice salted rim... I was happy about that.  They brought out a little brownie sundae for Paul's birthday. Everything was awesome!

name: EMWA
review: Everything at Michael Jordan's Restaurant was excellent! Brian was the server and he was outstanding!

name: tlp1022
review: We dined at Michael Jordan's for my husband's birthday. The staff made the evening special. I can't wait to go back!

name: DanW
review: Always a great choice! Looking forward to returning soon

name: DianaP
review: Awesome food and great service. We will be back

name: RichSGrotonCT
review: Great Food!!! Great Service!! Really great atmosphere.

name: M2020
review: Amazing food, extreamly tasty and fantastic staff.

name: Kddc45
review: You need a new hostess hopefully one with out an attitude

name: ANTHONYV
review: It‚Äôs not my first time. It‚Äôs about my fifth  and always everything was great me myself I can‚Äôt eat steak because I have a lap band so I had the salmon and it was perfect

name: Rich
review: Always a great feeling. Feels like I am home with friends who truly care. Was very impressed with your half price bottles of wine. a true winner. Feeling really good during very tricky times. Thanks Michael Jordans  Restaurant for making it a great experience. Will always be on my dinner list at Mohegan Sun.

name: Stoltgirl
review: My boyfriend had the steak which he loved and the spinach was outstanding.  I had the salmon which wasn't as good and so I really did not eat much of my meal.  The waitress noticed and asked me how it was.  I was honest and said I really didn't care for it. She offered to bring me something else but at that point I was not hungry.  When the bill came they  did not charge for my meal.  I thought that was very nice of them.  They are very accommodating and we will definitely be back but this time I will enjoy the steak.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Food was great the service was on point and the crab cake was excellent

name: Steaklover
review: First time here and it did not disappoint.  The service was absolutely flawless and the food?  Well our expectations were high based on what we had heard and they were certainly met!  Actually, more than met.  We'll be back.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Our waiter Jimmy was fantastic he walked us through the menu and made our anniversary special. By far the best service I have ever had at a restaurant. And not to mention a spectacular meal.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: It was great!

name: NancyL
review: Great service. Delicious food. Very nice ambience.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Excellent food! Service could of been better.

name: alan
review:
This was our first experience at Michael Jordan‚Äôs steak house and everything was delicious.
From the salad, rolls to the coffee I thoroughly enjoyed everything. 
Both my wife & I choose steaks & they were perfect. 
I would definitely go back.

name: BCNY
review: Was our 2nd visit and we enjoyed as much as our 1st.  Service was excellent - attentive and friendly.  Food was great and had a nice wine list.  We will be back!

name: BriA
review: AMAZING! I took my boyfriend here for his 23rd birthday and we were blown away! Food was beyond excellent, the restaurant itself was fabulous. They made his bday very special and was a night to remember. Definitely a little pricey but it was totally worth it, we can't wait come again.

name: johns
review: every thing was excellent but it was so cold we both had goose bumps and food got cold real fast. service was superbe and friendly. loved the food until it got cold.

name: johnC
review: There is a nice range of entree prices and selections. A good amount of time given between courses. Food and service e was great

name: GoodFoodGal
review: We tried one of the steak flights. Simply delicious!!

name: CraigC
review: It was awesome! Terrific service and top quality food. Attention to COVID requirement over the top clean.

name: LisaP
review: Great service. Very nice atmosphere.  Exceptional food. Nice for couple or group. Steaks are a la carte. $$$$

name: AlexJ
review: Nice dinner, friendly server, good timing of food.

name: PeterM
review: The food was absolutely fantastic.. Unfortunately our waiter was Mia for almost the entire dinner!! I had to ask 2 different waiters to please send someone over to our table, as well as bad to ask a buzz boy... It was our anniversary dinner also, which made for a not so good with the wife.... Secondly the entire dinner took 1 hour and 50 minutes which seemed to be much to long of a dinner time wise.

name: BrettL
review: I had the Japanese A-5 Wagyu steak and it was cooked perfectly. Came in for my anniversary and neither me or my lady was disappointed. Chef Kevin came out and talked with us. Service was unbelievable and steaks were even better. Very impressed!

name: AmandaB
review: Excellent!

name: JADE
review: It‚Äôs ok. Was super expensive for basic food in my opinion. Steak was good yes but not $60 good with no side. Waitress was very attentive and nice, however the host who checked us in was extremely rude. I wish I had his name. Won‚Äôt be going here again... eh.

name: ElleA
review: Food was good! But after seeing the menu for MJ23 next door, I feel a little played. There were a lot of the same menu items for less $$. However, I know we were paying for ambiance. Our server was amazing and very pleasant! Due to covid there were less tables available, which was really nice as we only had 3 other tables dining in the same room as us.

name: Kurt
review: The steaks are excellent. I had the MVP dinner which gives you 4 different selections of steak and they were all excellent. It fed 4 of us perfectly. You have to pay extra for the sides which are also delicious. I would definitely recommend Michael Jordan Steakhouse to my friends.

name: MoiraS
review: We went here for a one year anniversary. They were super nice about it, gave us a little card and everything. The waitress was so sweet, the food delicious and plentiful! And SOMEHOW they worked with my fianc√© so he could propose to me. They kept it a secret somehow, and I was super surprised! It just made the night all the more special!

name: OpenTable Diner
review: We had an amazing time. Everything was really delicious we will definitely be coming back again. Thank you for an amazing experience

name: Maria
review: The steak was great and our waiter Jimmy was wonderful!

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Our server Jimmy was one of the best servers we have ever had.  He has a great personality and was extremely attentive.

name: PatrickG
review: Well worth the 2 hour drive. Second time going and plan for many more visits.

name: KristinR
review: Service and Food was AMAZING!!! From the moment we walked in until we left, it was a GREAT experience.

name: KenM
review: MJ‚Äôs is consistent and high-quality. Have not had a bad meal or experience here in 15 years. Can‚Äôt wait to return.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Our waitress was outstanding we really loved her and hope we get her again. The food was outstanding and we had a great time.

name: Greg
review: The food and drinks were amazing. The resturante was super clean and with social distancing they were on point. Our server Jimmy was amazing, very quick and responsive to our needs and attention to detail was on point.

name: LORRAINEV
review: Great foods and drinks!!!  Great service and very clean!

name: JohnF
review: The food was outstanding and Jess our server was the best.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: It was amazing! Brian our server took the time to explain everything on the menu. Including what he would recommend down to what time of year it‚Äôs good to have certain dishes. The steaks were cooked to perfection! The trio mash potatoes were a good size that can be shared between two people. We also got the garlic bread and the meatballs for an appetizer and those were TO DIE FOR. Also, I told the waitress it was my fianc√©‚Äôs birthday and they brought out a card signed by everyone there and nice ice-cream and brownie desert. I would definitely go again! I felt like I got my money‚Äôs worth. 5/5 stars

name: sharonp
review: Excellent service from beginning to end.  The hostess was pleasant and promptly brought us to our seat.  They gave us a birthday card, because we noted it was a birthday celebration when we made our reservation with open table.  Our waitress Julia was a joy.  She was thoughtful and pleasant throughout.  The food was delicious and cooked to order thanks to Julia's expertise.  I would definitely recommend this restaurant to all my family and friends.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Great food!!!

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Had my 22nd Birthday Dinner at Michael Jordan‚Äôs and it was absolutely fantastic!!

name: JoeM
review: Wait staff was pleasent and helped us out when we had a question

name: RaymondC
review: Our waiter,Touza (?) is outstanding: took plenty of time to answer our questions as he explained the ‚Äúspecials‚Äù, two of which we ordered. Food was great!

name: concertman53
review: Our reservation was right on time. My wife and Ienjoyed our visit. We usually get the blue cheese garlic bread but we ordered their daily special appetizers today. I had grilled pork belley and my wife had a clam and mussel in wine broth dish. Both were excellent. Foe dinner I had the bone in rib eye and my wife the dinner special which was a filet served on lobster mashed potatoes with a topping of lobster. We also ordered the garlic spinich side and a bottle of wine. We both like our steaks medium rare and both were cooked to perfection. My wife was not too happy with the lobster on top of her steak, she said it tasted like it was from a can and not fresh. Other than that everything was very good. The service was excellent as well with just the right kind of attention. Glasses were kept full and we were checked in with but not enough to be intrusive, just the right amount. Highly recommend you make a reservation especially now with COVID.

name: SusZ
review: Make sure to request pricing on daily specials. I loved one of the offerings but wound up paying TWICE the price of the normal  meal choice offering!!!!!

name: PatrickE
review: Excellent food and service

name: louisi
review: We had dinner reservations for 7 pm party of four. Arrived on time but waited until 7:30 be we were seated. The manager, Dallas  was polite  but overwhelmed with the amount of people waiting for a table. Needed help.  Our waitress was also nice, helpful and polite, Julie. Nice qualities. The food was pricey( understand) but not what we expected. Example, my Rib Eye steak was under cooked and tough. Dallas did removed it from our check, nice. It was okay and you should try the restaurant.

name: AsiaR
review: Very good service. The food was excellent. My husband enjoyed everything. Our service was wonderful. We were not disappointed on bit.

name: AmyP
review:
We had a wonder Anniversary dinner at the restaurant Saturday night.
Our server, Jimmy, was the icing on the cake for this occasion. From the moment we sat down until we left he made sure we had everything we needed. And included a champagne toast and desert. We highly recommend this place for anyone looking for an excellent experience. Thanks for helping us celebrate our special day!!

name: LawrenceL
review: Service was ok. Food was not prepared the way we asked for it to be prepared, however, we are what was served. Sorry.

name: JamieE
review: Excellent food and service. Very clean

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Had an amazing experience at the MJ steakhouse. It was our first time visiting the restaurant and a memorable one indeed. Our waiter Jimmy was phenomenal. He made the experience personal and safe. We truly enjoyed the food, the staff and the cleanliness of the restaurant. We will be back and we hope to have Jimmy as our waiter again! His energy and friendliness left a smile on our faces. Compliments to the chef as well to most amazing steak dinner we‚Äôve ever had. Cheers!

name: KevinH
review: Great food , a bit expensive but the food was great

name: ScottS
review: Every part of our meal was outstanding. The garlic bread and bacon were an excellent way to get started.  Then the steak was cooked to perfection .

name: Srsalemi64
review: Service was good. But the appetizers were cold!! Then after reheating them they push our entree on us and the lobster tail and scallops wrapped in bacon were cold too!! Very disappointed and I won‚Äôt go back. Not for a $250 meal that‚Äôs cold.

name: MichaelC
review: A little surprised at the somewhat loud music but overall good.

name: AidaM
review:
The meat was burned! 
We pay so much for burned steak

name: Foodie
review: So romantic, excellent service and amazing food every time!

name: Lindaandmike
review: Our dinner was great. The food was beyond delicious. Our waitress Melissa,  made our night even better. She was one of the best waitresses we have ever had.  We can‚Äôt say enough about Michael Jordan‚Äôs and will definitely go again on Wednesday night when Melissa is working.

name: Mine21
review: Great place to eat. Food and crew were amazing. Just a bit pricey but worth it.

name: TammyR
review: Great Anniversary!!! The food was outstanding.  We will go back.

name: PaulP
review: Went for a nice 47th Anniversary dinner and thought we chose the best restaurant at Mohegan Sun and was surprised of the quality of the steaks for the price we paid.  Very tough Filet and Delmoaco  steaks. The waitress was excellent and the Manager did his best and the replacement steak was a little better.

name: NildaB
review: We were celebrating our 28th wedding anniversary and it was MAGNIFICENT! From the moment we arrived we were wished congratulations and a Happy Anniversary card was given to us. The food was amazing and I can‚Äôt say enough about the service. Our waitress Jen was attentive, and very helpful in making a choice with dinner. She was also super sweet!!! They even gave us champagne on the house. Thank you so much for making our special night so memorable!! Will definitely be back!!!

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Amazing food and service high quality food was delicious.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Jimmy & company were on point. Great food, great service and smiles all around

name: KellyR
review: We really enjoyed our experience at Michael Jordan's.  My husband enjoyed the 16 oz steak with crusted truffle, cooked to perfection.  I enjoyed the Crab leg special.  We also enjoyed the tuna tartare appetizer, it was fresh and delicious.  Our waitress Julie was wonderful.  The restaurant is handling Covid rules very well.  Certainly would recommend and would return.

name: KeithB
review: Great place to eat! wonderful place to relax and enjoy the fine food!

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Overall we had a good experience but we were underwhelmed by the steaks. Our waiter Jimmy was awesome and always made sure we had everything we needed and more! He was a great addition to the experience we had and I would definitely come back to see him again!

name: maryn
review: We love coming here and always eat at the bar and get the best service from Shirley and the boys!

name: Anonymous
review: Steak was ok Not well seasoned. Wine selection was limited. Service was excellent and made the experience a nice one. Food was ok. Overpriced for ok food

name: Legasea
review: Excellent food and service.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Excellent food as always. Nice ambiance. Honestly service could be better. Waiter takes the order and you never see him again until food arrives? Shouldn‚Äôt have to beg for water!

name: Raffaela
review: The food was fabulous.  The service spectacular!   The atmosphere was perfect.   Can‚Äôt wait to back.

name: LeslieC
review: The food was not worth the price, the drink tasted just like medicine the only good drink was the wine

name: Rosannf
review: Awesome meal.  Its one of the best restaurants as Mohegan.

name: MargaritaMJ
review: I have dined here multiple times. This experience was very good and would have been 5 stars with a few exceptions. I ordered the special Margarita, rocks, salt. They would not/could not put salt on the rim.  Some sort of Covid restaurant policy. Must have been specific to Michael Jordan‚Äôs as I had no issues getting a salted rim at other Mohegan Sun venues. The Soltoro Margarita was ok, nothing special.  The French onion soup was not up to its usual standards. I lacked some ‚Äúheartiness‚Äù and flavor. Very skimpy on the cheese. Disappointing compared to the usual. We both ordered the special: filet, 3 jumbo scallops wrapped it bacon and lobster scampi atop of some mashed potatoes. The filet was amazing, as were the scallops (and I‚Äôm not big fan of scallops..so you know they were great).  On the other hand, the lobster scampi lacked scampi sauce and the lobster pieces were overcooked. The bread is wonderful and it was a very nice date night.  We‚Äôll definitely return.

name: KikiG
review:
ALL the food we had was outstanding!!!  Appetizer: Garlic bread with blue cheese; Main course: Rib eye Steak...cooked to perfection; Lamb Chops...very succulent!!  Side dishes were the trio of mashed potatoes and Macaroni and Cheese....definitely not your "run-of-the-mill"!
We were celebrating a Birthday and the honoree was given a birthday card signed by the whole staff as well a surprise birthday dessert.
The service throughout was impeccable....very friendly and eager to please!
I will definitely return to Michael Jordan's Steak House. Even though it was "pricey", I feel it was well worth it!

name: AdelaG
review:
Had a wonderful time! The food, the ambience and the service was exceptional! Danielle was our waitress and she made great suggestions. She was informative, kind and a pleasure. 

We will definitely go back!

name: LisaG
review: Our waiter Jimmy was amazing- very knowledgeable about the menu and you could tell that he took a great amount of pride in making sure that we had an outstanding dining experience. He‚Äôs truly an asset to the MJ team! The food was cooked to perfection- my husband I both had the filet mignon special with lobster scampi and it was fabulous- the price point was very reasonable for all that you got with it (mashed potatoes and 3 of the largest bacon-wrapped scallops I have ever seen)! I totally recommend MJ‚Äôs for a special night out!

name: LinaS
review: We were celebration my husbands birthday.  It was amazing.  Signed card and birthday wishes that followed.  Service was attentive and friendly.  Food was the star.  We ordered tuna tartar and crab cake was delicious and presentation amazing.  Steak was perfectly done as was promised.

name: OpenTable Diner
review: Someone specials 27th birthday . MJ did a great job on the experience . Always comes thru in the clutch ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è. #MJ#GOAT

name: LynnC
review: I don‚Äôt eat steak so they made me scallops because it was on the app list I think you should offer more variety but I love it there my buys love the steak

name: SandraP
review: The food and service continue to be excellent.   The restaurant was set up in a covid-safe manner.  I will return.

name: LisaB
review: Steak was good but overpriced. Service was excellent.

name: OpenTable Diner
review:
Very lovely. Delicious cocktails and food. 

Table behind us was rather loud and was speaking vulgar- as a female made me feel uncomfortable. 

Otherwise our waitress was wonderful as well as the gentleman that greeted us upon arrival.

name: ColleenW
review: Food was good service was great! I was not a fan of their signature garlic bread it was very very hard, crunchy is one thing but it was just to hard.

name: MarshaN
review: Another gem of a restaurant, it's worth even traveling to! I remembered from about 20 yrs ago those filet mignons and lobster mashed potatoes! name: Skullster
review: Always great good and good service!  We had filet mignon bone in with bone marrow butter and collasol crab cake as an entree. Steak cooked perfectly and crab tender and delicious!

name: OpenTable Diner
review: The ambiance is perfect for a date night and the food is incredible. Very friendly and helpful staff as well. Made date night very special!

name: Josem
review: For the price you pay the foods not all there. The service was great but for an upscale restaurant the menu could have been bigger and have more to offer. The portions are very small for the price.

name: ErinM
review: 50 birthday dinner

name: claireK
review:
Excellent meal. The staff is outstanding.

name: StevenC
